title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree with the statement "Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. "People always try new things in the oneway or the other to make their life more affordable or happier. When a person tries to develop something that would make life of society better, he will succeed in doing so because he has invested considerable amount of time and risk. Once successful, he looks for new things that are possible for many people. He takes this as a spirit or challenge. He brainstorm ideas, put them to experiment and take the risks. It is a desire to try newthings with risk for the people who were successful in the past. It makes them feel happier and drive forward. I would give some personal examples to strongly support my above statement. For instance, when I was working on a research project at a pharmaceutical company in my early childhood, I developed a drug for cancer that helped cure many people. I took the risk of developing the drug knowing the consequences that would have on my life. This successful incident led me to try new things. Development of an instrument that revolutionized the lives of people who have Diabetes(people who cannot regulate bloodsugar). This happened when I was with Pfizer in early 1984. At times there is no way people can analyse their blood sugar level without going to hospitals. It was really very hard on me to develop and instrument that would one day help everyone to get their blood glucose results instantaneously. I have spent a considerable amount of time on this project. If I am right, it took me 10 years to develop this instrument. I felt it was like taking the risk, because I may have succeeded in the end or may not have. I was very successful in doing so.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: It is more important for students to understand the ideas and concepts rather than to learn facts which were once stated by the people themselves. Facts are nothing but inferences drawn after experiencing and researching on those issues by the people who were once students. Once the concepts and ideas based on a particular issue are known by the student, then the facts can obviously be drawn in the end. It is a fact that the SUN only rises in the east and sets in the west.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: We are all aware of the fact that "Knowledge of Divine". Through academic studies we gain some knowledge to prove ourselves in our concerned fields. I disagree with the statement "it is better to have broad knowledge than to specialize in one specific subject". As we know "Rolling stone has no moss", similarly a man with interests in many subjects is not worthwhile. The reason why i disagree is that a person with specialisation in one specific subject will have more demand than a person with knowledge of many academic subjects. As we see in our daily life, a lecturer, a draughtsman, a lawyer, etc. these are all specialists in one particular subject. The second reason is that as we know, this world is full of competition. Everyone faces competition in his field. If we are specialised in one particular subject, we can thrive hard and we can get rid of this competition, by having immense knowledge of one subject. The third reason i would like to present, is that a person's ability to learn may be more , but it is limited to a particular field or a particular subject. If anyone wishes to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects he may not be able to grasp all the stuff from the subject. Its not just a matter of possibility or not , its just impossible for anyone to have such a memorising or knowledge accumulating power. The last and final reason is that though having broad knowledge of many academic subjects, he will work to a field or organisation where he uses the knowledge of one particular subject. But not all the knowledge of his all subjects. If he wants to switch over to another field, he has to work from the beginning i. e.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: In the modern world, we have learned almost every subject until university. And many students who graduate university are complaining about this education system. Because when they get a job, they don't use the knowledge they learned in school. I can understand their opinion. In some parts I agree with that. However, it can't be a reason that we just have to learn one specific subject. Learning a variety of knowledge is very helpful for people to be a specialist in some area. If someone wants to be a biologist, he needs to experience other subjects. Mathematics, Literature, Athletics. etc. After he experiences these areas he can find his special gift in biology. Unless he didn't experience these areas he couldn't overcome his barrier that will face some day. He can think that he may be able to do other work even though he is not sure about his gift in that area. Especially in law, if you imagine a lack of knowledge about other subjects, it can be ineffective. Law is the subject to constitute the social system. It is related to all parts of the world. It affects people's lives. A judge's narrow mind can be biased on one side. And there will be a lot of chaos in public transport.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.

Everyday another selection for a material is made or invented and coming to our TVs or newspaper pages to show us his advantages. people have different ideas about the issue that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. Some think that it is right others think that it is a wrong way of thinking. I'm personally agree with the first ones. First of all, advertisements make the products seem bigger. Every advertisement is a little circus show to make you believe that 'this one' is the 'one' that you have been looking for since your childhood. To make you believe they will try every method, especially do not believe in the size of the product on the television. For example last year a newspaper began to promote a tape. The tape was the best that I have ever seen, I mean 'the tape of my life'.

text: Advertisements are the most common and colorful part of our lives in the 21st century. Everyday another selection for a material is made or invented and coming to our TVs or newspaper pages to show us his advantages. people have different ideas about the issue that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. Some think that it is right others think that it is a wrong way of thinking. I'm personally agree with the first ones. First of all, advertisements make the products seem bigger. Every advertisement is a little circus show to make you believe that 'this one' is the 'one' that you have been looking for since your childhood. To make you believe they will try every method, especially do not believe in the size of the product on the television. For example last year a newspaper began to promote a tape. The tape was the best that I have ever seen, I mean 'the tape of my life'. I ordered the product and when the box came to my home I was really amazed, however, there was a little problem; the tape was a little more than I saw in the advertisement. Secondly, most advertisements make the audience believe that the product is cheaper. Life in big cities like my own is very expensive to live.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: "Innovation is the mother of success " I strongly support the prompt that successful people try new things rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. Surely,success comes to those who try new things. "Risk is another name for success. "If one takes the risk of investing in a new business then two conditions take birth. The first one is that he will earn profit for himself which is a positive aspect of the risk taken. But on the other hand there is equal probability of his failure which is a negative aspect. In my opinion,both of them can't be stated as success. Because real success is to learn from failure and then hit your target again,but this time with full preparation and timing. Then I am sure that the person will not lose again. This implies that a person learns from his failure. Yes, I agree that,success comes to those who try new things and with proper planning. But its not only trying new things without even pondering over them. If a person takes a risk to gamble then its his luck that will win one time or two but its not that he will win. Its just a waste of money andtime. So risk should be taken in the right direction. It should not be in a vague direction. Let's have an example of the great industrialist of India Late DhiruBhai Ambani, founder of Reliance Group. In his early career he only tried his hand at textiles and he succeeded which encouraged him to try in other fields too. He tried and got a victory over all the fields he invested in. This can't be stated as luck rather it was the risk taken by him and the planning which gave him the crown of victory. To conclude. I would state that its not trying new things which gains you victory but planning and hardwork along with risk. Blending could make anybody a "winner". "Success is taking risks at the proper time with proper planning and hardwork. ".

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I totally agree with the opinion that young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities. There are several reasons, they spend too much time on their jobs, they are not familiar with the people in their communities and unwilling to try to get to know them, and they prefer to spend their own time on other pleasures. In the technology generation, people spend more time on their jobs because they arecompetitive. They have to work very hard to keep their jobs. They have to spend a lot of time to achieve the achievements. They have to work as long as possible to show their loyalty to their boss. That causes the average time in office increased and there is no time left for the communities. Besides, modern society is becoming more conservative than before because of the increasing crimes. People don't say hello to strangers. They treat the strangers with a suspicious manner. That makes people unwilling to get involved in community services. I heard that someone had tried to raise a fund for the community services but the door was shut heavily because he was thought to be a cheater. Also, in the city, there are many attractive pleasures, such as karo-oki, pubs, dancing clubs.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Products seem much better than they really are? I agree. These days the best seem product is the best seller. For me there are three reasons why this happens. First the price of the product. Second the way of the owner presents the product tosociety. Last but not least the quantity of money that the producer will spend on making the product. Let's talk about price. The money is the one that moves the world. In the United States the biggest society class is the middle one , that means the worker class. Most of the population will be looking for the cheap product. The advertisements make the product look good and if the price is good people will buy the product. The first impression of the product, is what we first look at. The promotion is very important, if the advertisements convince the person thatthe product is good they will buy it. Also people do not have too much time to look at the difference between the products and if in the promotions it says that it is the best seller you will buy it without notice that doesn't mean that it is the best one. The company cost for making the productis the most important thing forthem. Alot of companies prefer safe money, to selling to the people a good product. A good example of that is the food, natural food is better but artificial flavor is cheapest, so flavor maybe it will be better but it is not because it is not natural. In conclusion will produce will make them products seem better than other because ofmarket competition. My advice is to always look for the contents of the products if they are foot, medicines or any supplements. If it is a transportation like cars, equipment, etc ; look at the material that is composed of which will help you to know which one is better.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Students have many choices of their study methods. Learning facts are outweighted to understanding concepts in three ways because learning facts is easy, quick and efficient. Firstly, facts are not abstract concepts and ideas so it is easier to be comprehended by students. Besides that, it is easier to remember a fact than the long definitions. In daily class, teachers always like to use some examples and facts to support their or her opinion. When people talk to each other, someone throws a fact that nobody heard before, people will think that person is knowledgable and it is easy for those listeners to retell the facts to others. Secondly, learning facts is a fast way to learn. Most of the facts do not contain only one concept or idea applied in the books. Since facts are not as simple as concepts and ideas, people are able to learn towns of concept and ideas through one fact. This can shorten the time of study because people only need to learn several facts and these facts may cover all the concepts and ideas in the books. Last but not least, efficiency is another important factor that made me think that learning facts is a better way to learn concepts and ideas. People live in society and things happen every second.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I agree with this opinion : Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. There are 3 reasons why I do. The pictures of advertisements are usually very attractive. For example, the picture of the apartment's part of the room. It always seems larger and brighter than they really are. However, when the customer actually visits the apartment, they say the room is not as good as they expected. Also, sometimes it is not as clean as the advertisement picture. The goods which the company sells are also more simple than the company says such as music players. The company sings that the products of them can be recorded and played more clearly than the productions used to be. However, sometimes there is no difference between the new ones and the old ones except the price. There is one more reason here. Our imaginations help to think better when we see the advertisements. If we watch the commercials on TV, we get a good impression at first even though we don't know how the products really are. Then we think we want it, but when we see the products with our eyes, we are disappointed with them. It is because the products are not as attractive as our imaginations. For these 3 reasons, I think most advertisements are not as good as they really are. They commerce just good points of the products, but we need to have critical thinking. T.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree with the following statement. Because I am not a child, i can do many things by myself, and can do them well. First hand, i think many people want to have their own place, they can think and they can do anything they want to do. Young people enjoy life more than older people do. Young people have many things to enjoy life. Such as shopping,swimming,singing,running and so on. There are many ways to enjoy yourself. But old people do not have so many things to enjoy life. They like to go out for a walk,and to look at newspapers. Sometimes they like to be with their children to have dinner. Second hand, i like to do something myself, i don't like to do something that's allowed by my parents. I will feel some dissatisfaction. I want to have a lot of time to do my things. I like travelling and i want to go to HongKong and America one day. I like America so much,i want to study there with many new friends, I want to meet many new friends in America. But my parents don't want me to make a lot of friends, they want me to study everyday. But i don't want to study everyday,i want to have some free time that is only for me to be with my friends. So, i think the statement is not right. I like cartoons best, but many parents think that is not a good thing.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Studying is a complex process that requires methodology. On what should the students focus? Should they attempt to understand the more important concepts and ideas or should they try to accumulate as much knowledge in facts as they can? Understanding ideas and concepts is enabling students to think in a certain way that is primordial for their success. Then, this large knowledge can be applied in different situations more specifically. Moreover understanding concepts and ideas is making it much easier for the students to learn related facts. Understanding ideas and concepts is building a way of thinking, a process of anlysis, that is required in order to understand deeply the studies. For example, when learning basket ball, it is very important to understand that the most important defense is rather than attack when the adversary is strong.

Should they attempt to understand the more important concepts and ideas or should they try to accumulate as much knowledge in facts as they can? Understanding ideas and concepts is enabling students to think in a certain way that is primordial for their success. Then, this large knowledge can be applied in different situations more specifically. Moreover understanding concepts and ideas is making it much easier for the students to learn related facts. Understanding ideas and concepts is building a way of thinking, a process of anlysis, that is required in order to understand deeply the studies.', 'For example, when learning basket ball, it is very important to understand that the most important defense is rather than attack when the adversary is strong.']

Humans have already developed computers which can store facts.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: My opinion about having broad knowledge of many academic subjects is that having broad knowledge of one specific subject is that broad knowledge is much better for our studies than the one specific subject, which reasons include that broad knowledge could open our horizons about the whole study and we could have wider rangesfor us to choose our majors through studying broad knowledge. In modern times, many jobs need various knowledge because the matters require complete abilities and broad knowledge which contents many academic subjects, such as math, physics and chemistry could provide a broader knowledge for us which one specific subject could not. For example, If we are a lawyer, we not only use the knowledge about the law, we still need the knowledge about the economy and human nature. We would benefit from broader knowledge in our work. It provides us with more information when we should solve a problem. Furthermore, we would choose our major from what we learned in school and studying broad subjects across the range for us to choose. What I have found now is that which major I should choose. Though I have already studied some subjects, I still do not figure out which major suits me best. This is an important aspect because I should use the knowledge about my major after graduation and I would earn money by working in this field.

text: My opinion about having broad knowledge of many academic subjects is that having broad knowledge of one specific subject is that broad knowledge is much better for our studies than the one specific subject, which reasons include that broad knowledge could open our horizons about the whole study and we could have wider rangesfor us to choose our majors through studying broad knowledge. In modern times, many jobs need various knowledge because the matters require complete abilities and broad knowledge which contents many academic subjects, such as math, physics and chemistry could provide a broader knowledge for us which one specific subject could not. For example, If we are a lawyer, we not only use the knowledge about the law, we still need the knowledge about the economy and human nature. We would benefit from broader knowledge in our work. It provides us with more information when we should solve a problem. Furthermore, we would choose our major from what we learned in school and studying broad subjects across the range for us to choose. What I have found now is that which major I should choose. Though I have already studied some subjects, I still do not figure out which major suits me best. This is an important aspect because I should use the knowledge about my major after graduation and I would earn money by working in this field. If I choose the wrong major because of lacking interests and being unable to study, I could not revive myself in the future. Broad knowledge makes me comfortable choosing the one I like best and studying my major well. To sum up,though one specific subject is a skill for certain people to use like painting , I still draw the conclusion that broad knowledge is better than one specific subject. Time to sleep, bye.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree with this statement because in my opinion successful people have more money to spend than normal people. They can try what they want, and in their opinion anything is forbidden. They want to try new experiences, learn new things and sometimes take risks. Last week I read in the newspaper that a famous Italian singer decided to spend a month in an unknown place ( probably an island). He wants to be alone. No  one can go with him. He doesn't have a personal phone because in this place the phone does not work in this way and he can not communicate. He wants to stay in contact with nature. To find food he can only fish or hunt. In my opinion it was a very dangerous experience but I think that the only reason that this singer decided to go is to increase his success. If he does not have the economic possibility I am sure that he will not go. I think that it is important to increase your knowledge, try new things but there are some limits that we must respect. It is good to do small things but better than doing more things not well. I think that the dream that man has is to fly, but for natural conditions it is not possible.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Successful people generally think very widely and try to see every face of a subject. This is a very effective way to solve the issues. The theory that successful people are likely to try and learn new things is true. Trying or learning new things leads the person to think widely and consequently, this person gains the skill of finding great solutions to the problems that the company faces. This essay indicates how learning or trying new things can improve the career of a person. First of all, trying new things can help people to think freely. It is obvious that the people who always prefer to do familiar things have similar ideas and one type of solution to every issue. In the high-budget companies, the managers generally hire workers to investigate their positive feelings about new subjects. The reason why trying new skills is important for business success is that the problems of the sectors have a great variety and the solutions should be found by thinking about every possibility. People who like to try new things are eligible for the business sector because they are open minded and also brave enough to change their habitats. Courage in that sector is very significant for the success of giving life to high risk solutions and with the experience of new things and enhancing the old habitat indicate the dimension of the courage of a person. The second point is that trying new things increases creativity. Moving to a new place is one part of it and as an evidence of this theory, the artists sometimes move to non-native countries to create and improve their artistic works. The variety of ideas leads to the success of the works. To sum up, trying new things is a significant requirement for success in working life. Though it seems that replacing an old thing is not easy, this change gives people the ability to think widely. Courage and creativity are two examples that a person can gain from the changes and use them in daily life. The.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I totally disagree with the statement, 'Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities'. WE ARE, if the word community determines not a division on the basis of ' race, colour or creed'. The new generation of young people are more social conscious than those in the past. They broke open many barriers that older generations of same age group lived in. The new ads on the TV would speak to the extent of support even from their parents do young people receive for participating in helping their communities. In this case, the ad begins showing a distressed young man sitting on a balcony watching the streets he lives in. He is shocked to see the state of living he is in, with roads filled with litter, nothing in place. He then gets shocked to see a little boy searching for food near a bin. This little boy awakens to the plight of situations that can be altered. He invites his friends not for an outing like any other weekend, but to clean up the streets, not waiting for help from the government. They also help the little boy with some food, and they raise donations to help the boy with education. Parents are shown not restricting the movements of the boys. That could just be an ad, but it depicts the state of mind the new generation has. We are capable of bads, but if molded, we can make the best out of the worst. We are scheduling the time more perfectly, devoting time to everything. Our generation is 'Jack of all, and also MASTER of all'.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Nowadays, elderly people think that young people do not give enough time to help their communities. It is true that young people seem to concentrate more on their own concerns. However, there are still lots of other young people who love to help their communities and volunteers for hard social work. First of all, in the case of Korea, young students are anticipating voluntary work for 40 hours per year. Even though it is kind of a school homework, every student helps their communities by visiting old people who do nt have any relatives, or orphanages and some of them really feel pleased to help them. Furthermore, in Korea, when students attend universities they try to participate more actively because they can have more free time than before. Not everybody but lots of my friends are volunteering to teach elementary to high school students who are not available to have a tutor without receiving money. Some of them also visit elderly people who are lonely to talk with them persistently. It is true that some young people seem to think only about themselves but there are still lots of young people who are helping their communities. It is dangerous to overlead all young people who are selfish.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities. I agree with the above statement that young people do not give enough time to help their communities. There are many reasons to support this. Firstly, in this competitive world young people are very concerned with their career,goals and their aims, so they are more involved in their studies. As a purpose they go to college regularly and study their day to day lessons regularly. The subject has become so vast that they have to refer to many books and it takes a lot of time for them. So, they do not have much time for other activities such as, helping their communities. Secondly, people now a days show much interest in enjoying themselves with their friends. They either go to the movies or restaurants or pubs or to the playground with their friends. They are always in a mood to enjoy themselves. They do not help the communities because they do not spare their time to work on good things and help their communities. Thirdly, people these days have become very selfish and they do their own work which is helpful to that particular individual. They do not want to help their communities which are beneficial to all. That is why he concentrates mainly on his work rather than helping the community. Finally, nowadays people are more attracted to media such as television, newspapers, magazines, newspapers etc. ,.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I agree with the statement that ideas and concepts are more important than learning facts. With proper analysis of the ideas and facts one can learn facts out of them. Ideas can form the basis for learning new facts about the particular area which you are about to learn. Concepts are much more important for the development of the facts. In real life facts aboutlife , its existence are developed by concepts of Science. Researchers are spending huge amounts of time and money to learn facts about the betterment of life from the concepts and ideas that they got. Nowadays, there are many medicines and vaccines being developed to cure different diseases held with human beings. To develop these drugs concepts and ideas are the basis for the chemists and biologists in developing these. Not only in disease curing, in the investigation of a criminal case , investigators use the ideas and develop concepts to trace the facts about the case. Ideas are back bone for the developing new concepts to trace the facts. So students should develop to improve their knowledge towards understanding the new concepts and explore their ideas. Ideas and concepts are just like fundamentals of a subject. If one has fundamentals can learn new facts in the subject using those fundamentals. Without fundamental knowledge one can not go to the destination. Ideas and concepts are not visible but the developed facts from them are visible as publications in the articles. Many science and art publications publish the truths developed by researchers developed from concepts and ideas of subject matter only. These days, globalization is globalizing.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. Actually, both of them enjoy their life. But, there is a difference between young people and older people. Older people don't have much energy like young people. They've worked hard for a long time, and it's possible that they have already seen many good things, and had experiences before. Therefore, they'll not be interested in doing or enjoying many things. Some old people really enjoy their life, but I think young people can enjoy it more than older people. For example, many old couples travel to some other countries because their son or daughter bought the ticket or tour plan for them.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Some people might say that using a tour guide is a waste of money. But, fundamentally, I agree with the idea that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. My primary reason is that using a tour guide is safer than not using one. In particular, people who participate in the group travel have less experience of going abroad. They completely lack knowledge about this foreign country. A tour guide has a lot of experience and a lot of information about it. For example, in Asia, there are many dangerous areas which almost all residents keep away from. If you are taught by a tourist about this information, you will not face the dangerous situation. However, it is true that there are poor guides. Preventing you from hiring a bad tourist, you should choose a big company which provides good service. The second reason is that the tour guide can lead you to a good place where you can not be detected by yourself. In particular, on a short trip, you should go around some country in a hurry, and you do not have enough time to spare. In this point of view, the existence of a tour guide can reduce the waste of time. In addition, he can provide a lot of information which makes your trip more exciting. If you do not hire a tour guide , you will regret it. Most people seldom go on a trip, at most, once in a year.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: I have always considered travelling as an excellent way to get to know many people and to get to know many different cultures. But it could be a little bit expensive and dangerous if you do not have the appropriate instruction. In this paper I want to discuss the advantages and disadvantages that we could encounter when we travel with out a suitable orientation. First of all, If we are travelling in a group led by a tour guide, we can feel safer and more confident to explore new things and landscapes. It is due to the expertise and experience that a tour guide could have. Moreover, the guide could show to the travellers the important and interesting places that the group should visit during the trip. It is very important because it can save money and time. ! you go straight to the point.

In this paper I want to discuss the advantages and disadvantages that we could encounter when we travel with out a suitable orientation. First of all, If we are travelling in a group led by a tour guide, we can feel safer and more confident to explore new things and landscapes. It is due to the expertise and experience that a tour guide could have. Moreover, the guide could show to the travellers the important and interesting places that the group should visit during the trip. It is very important because it can save money and time.', '! you go straight to the point.']

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I think both points are equally important in college but in your later life it would be more important to understand the arguments and basics than to learn the facts off by hard work. Nobody can understand a theme just by learning simple facts, it is the complex idea that makes someone understand. Everybody can learn things off by hard, but not everyone understands the material. And the understanding for me makes a person grow not only its mind but also its personality. But still there are some benefits to both sides. When I had history classes in school for instance, I was always really good at understanding the ideas and concepts that were discussed, but always when I had to write an exam I had problems remembering important dates. And that is what the main point of history is, isn't it? The result was that I never got a better mark than a three. That is just the average mark in Germany. But when I started to study the dates which resemble the facts in the question. I suddenly got much better marks. On the other hand if I had just known the dates I would have gotten a much worse mark, because I probably wouldn't have understood any of the assignments. But I also think that there are cases where you just have to know simple facts. In some parts of biology, chemistry, physics and maths, in all science. I mean if you have to label body parts of an animal or human, there is no way in doing that without knowing the facts. An eye is an eye and not a leg, this is quite obvious.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I agree with this statement. Although I admit it is important that products have real quality, there are several reasons why I think advertisements make products more valuable and it is quite important. First of all advertisements give people the chance to know about the products easily and conveniently. Everyday we can meet lots of products advertised in newspapers, and on TV and even on the internet. That gives people more belief it is a good product. For example, one american wine ad gives people the belief that wine made in America is very good compared with wine made in France or Chile. They are produced by a process and taste with some celebrities and change the common belief that American wine is low quality Second, the advertisement represents the product's image. So sometimes people buy the product because of their image. From my personal experience, I liked basketball so much in junior high school.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Advertisements have become an important part of our daily life. We rely so much on the advertisements and bring the product to use. But, most of the advertisements make the products look much better than what they really are. I totally agree with this. I have heard lots from people about the superficial advertisements whose products are really bad and i have experienced it too. There are a lot of hair related products like shampoos, conditioners and hair styling products of different brands. I have dry and weak hair. I happened to see an ad for shampoo for dry and weak hair. There advertisement showed a model having silky and strong hair after using it. So relying on the advertisement i bought that shampoo and used it but to my surprise i didnt get even okay results. Basically they try to sell their products by making progandas about the product but actually it is not satisfying at all. Lets consider the example of fitness equipment. The advertisements show that if you use this product you will lose so many pounds, if you use that product you will lose some more pounds. Since in the US obesity is the major problem, people rely on these aids and bring home the instruments. They do lose some pounds but it is not the same pounds they show in advertisements. In most of the advertisements, they will just show beautiful models and celebrities to make their ad look fancier than it actually is. I want to tell one of my friends about my experience with cell phone service.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I disagree with the statement,i think students have to learn the facts inorder to understand the concept,with out learning the facts regarding how a student can read? In my opinion students have to learn every thing practically so that they can remember for more time,lets take an example, lets take a lecture from a professor in a biology class,the professor is explaining about some subject related to frogs , in this case with out seeing the frog just having a figure on the blackboard and blindly following the textbook is not good, if you want to learn the subject perfectly then go to the biology lab and test a frog then know the facts by your own and then prepare your own notes, then see whether what you studied is correct or not. With out doing all these just by reading the textbook andsaying that "I got understood" is not at all a correct thing for students. We can learn facts by doing things practically and by conducting research. Students should be in a position of describing new ideas and new concepts but not in the position of mugging the old ideas and concepts. There is a lot of thrills in learning the facts, here is an example from my personal experience, last time I went to my friends' place which is some place near warangal (historical place in the Southeren part of India It is a very rural area even power supply is not there,the people there are uneducated ,there is a belief in that area that if any one goes at night time to a place called "maranam"(a big tree with lots of caves) then they will be killed by an evil ,i felt strange when i heard this,that night me and my friends went there my friends were hiding near another tree and i'm standing nearer the tree, i waited for themThis is why learning facts will also give a thrill,and one important thing is learning new things will make.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Many people are afraid when they try something new. On the other hand, some people enjoy the afraid feeling and the risks. Many times, some people, who try something not familiar, could be successful, fortunately. In my opinion, trying new things is effective and essential to make one's life and others' lives successful. The first reason why I think trying something new is right is that it needs to be brave. Even though there are a lot of damage and risks as you try a new thing, the difficulties probably can give chances to your life. Bravery is one of the most important factors in order to not only be successful but also live with confidence. In that, trying something new means the person is very brave, which needs to be self-esteem oneself. I believe someone, who loves himself , can enjoy his or her life. In addition, trying something new gives more opportunities. If you do what you already know how to do well, you will probably not fail. However, you cannot succeed as much as you want, because the ordinary thing is for everyone. The new things are the only way to get more opportunities. For example, Bill Gates is the richest person in the world. However, at first, his company was not that wealthy to make him the wealthiest person on Earth, because the "computer business" was not famous, then. Fortunately, Gates challenges into the new field, and he achieves his goals and helps other humans to enjoy computers. Finally, trying new things makes the world improve. When people who try new things achieve success, it means the world becomes more comfortable.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I strongly agree with the statement " it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. "Students are required to understand ideas and concepts. The main reason for this is the ideas are going to increase the way they think and the concepts help them to implement their thoughts. The lecturers should teach students to get ideas for new things from their childhood. They should give some questions and tell them to implement their lessons. Such that their brain gets more ideas when they see or come to know about a particular point. title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: It is debatable whether young people do not give enough time to helping their communities or not. some people say that they can not find the reason why they have to care about their communities. However, I firmly believe that helping their communities is quite an important thing in their life. First of all, We can not live by ourselves. we have to help each other. of course that is an option and we can choose whatever we want, but nowadays, It would be harder and harder if people tried to live bythemselves. If we try to spend our time in communities, It can be a good way to get to know many people who can help us when we get into a hard time. For example, I was trying to have my own piano recitle in my communites. and I heard that is not so easy. but fortunately I was a volunteer in my community last summer and through that experience, I had a chance to get to know lots of people who could help me. so I could have a report very easily because of their recommendations. Secondly, we can improve our social skills. nowadays, people tend to be isolated. but I dont think that is the best way to live. For example, I have a friend and she always tries to be alone in her room.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Infact yes. Young people enjoy their lives more than they will do years later. I would attribute this phenomenon mainly to maturity that creaps in with age. Young people are often more carefree and always get a sound sleep. Having lived disciplined lives as children in the family, they get adventurous and naughty in their rearing adolescence. Also, companionship at a young age is too emotional. Relationships break and then again make trivial issues. They have not seen hardships of life and are capable of taking on larger risks. In their quest to find out what life is all about, they get new experiences. In my view, Learning new things is the biggest fun. Young people enjoy the thrill of life even when they lose something because every defeat opens up new avenues for them just like every victory does. Its their zeal and vigour that differentiates them from the older people. In contrast older people are like a peaceful river nearing the sea. Their lives may be very happy but the bubbliness of a young child is not there. They have serious responsibilities on their shoulders. A lonely young person is well off compared to an old person. In the family, getting a lot of affection and attention is the birthright of the young. In a.

Also, companionship at a young age is too emotional. Relationships break and then again make trivial issues. They have not seen hardships of life and are capable of taking on larger risks. title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: i disagree with the idea that it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. i think that understanding ideas and concepts is very important, but i think also that learning facts is not less important than ideas and concepts. they are at least at the same level. i think that ideas and concepts are at the basis of a theory and so they are at the basis of our knowledge, but sometimes facts can replace and modify the original theory, so it is important to know the real facts! In Italy there is a famous affermation that is "la migliore teoria e' la pratica" that can be translated in english as "the best theory is the real practice ", and i think that this affermation represents perfectly my opinion.

This keeps you away from smoking, drinking and even dancing with your love(your wife), in short the means to enjoy life. Love reminds me that young people enjoy the joy of asking a girl out for the first time in your life. It is a very joyous moment for the young man experiencing it for the first time. Later on in your life it becomes a habit and you want to take every girl on a date and shes ready if you are young. Young people also get to experience the joy of the first day at work , everyone enjoys it and its different. Then one day finally you get married to the girl you love and grow old with her and have kids. All these happy moments are experienced when you are young. However young people enjoy life not only because enjoying means being happy. There is more to enjoyment than just happiness. The dark side , when things start going wrong and you just cannot help it. Many people are scared of experiencing such challenges in life. I had a bad experience once in my life when everything went wrong for me. Nothing seemed to work and like everyone else i too was sad and depressed. But i learned a lot from it. My bad times taught me a lesson in life and if it hadn't been for those bad times i wouldn't have been what i am today. Pain they say is inevitable , so why not turn a masochist.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: The speaker said that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. I totally agree with this point. to support this point, we must investigate the main features of modern society, especially the effect of television. The most important invention of modern technology is the television. With the advent of TV, the advertisement has greater effects on TV than newspapers and magazines. Today's people rely on TV in order to get more information around the world. We can just see the TV screen without any efforts. It is so easy! And the transmission of information on TV is very fast to keep pace with the change of the world. Our technology could be able to change the world very fast. Seeing the screen means that we could easily be affected by an image. Most advertisements should show their most things within a very short time. So they must try to emphasize their goods to people seeing many ads. There is a reason why many advertisements like to use specific images. People cannot remember the name of a product, some remember the very advertisement of the product. These effects bring to the results of reproducing the more products by many factories. Some people say like that; the human being is the being who can think rationally.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I would like to answer this question by introducing what that means: enjoy life. Whether people enjoy their lives or not depends on many things. Firstly, it could depend on your hobbies, like playing basketball or fishing. Both are completely different and you might say that fishing is more suitable for older people whereas basketball is more suitable for younger people. Secondly, it depends on your social circumstances. This means some people enjoy spending time with their family. Others like to go to parties whenever possible. This can also be related to age. Additionally it could depend on the education. Higher educated people maybe would like to visit an opera rather than hanging around in a bar. Today a lot of people think education was much better in former times. Nevertheless I believe younger people enjoy life more for several reasons (but this answer is somehow biased, because I think I am young). All the reasons mentioned above cannot lead to an adequate answer from my point of view, because those are personal things. Younger people enjoy life more, because they have less responsibilities. So younger people have more space to be spontaneous than older people have. Furthermore younger people are on average healthier, which gives them the possibility of doing more things in a shorter period of time. In addition there is a lot of stuff to discover, which older people may have discovered already. The advantage of older people is that they usually have more money for enjoying life, but I believe that is caused by today's globalization it is less important. Everything becomes cheaper and money is not required for enjoying life.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Traveling is the best way to discover many places and areas around the world, and as you may know everyone should know the place where he or she lives. There are many people who like to travel , but they are those like to travel alone and others in a group. It depends on the traveler. Since a long time ago I have liked to travel in a group for many reasons. First, getting together with many friends makes the trip enjoyable with many things, such as discussion on different topics, giving ideas about the place where we are going to,. Second, I feel good taking a meal in a group ,I remember one day I traveled with my school friends to discover one of the most beautiful places in Morocco. It was to Atlas Mountains. I remember when we got to eat together in a great environment. Third, the most important thing is to have a guide, an expert for your tour, that's the only way to have several information in your mind during the trip, which remains the source of information. Finally, you will not know the importance of traveling in a group until you enjoy it with some sort of things that I mentioned above. that is one of the best things in life. Think about it !.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I am not completely sure about the agreement with the statement. The ideas and the conceps are at the basis of facts. The fact begins when a man decides to put in practice an idea or a concept, making it real. So if you want to know something you have to ask why he is doing this, what are the causes that are at the bottom of the decision that makes something real. On the other hand facts are necessary to know the consequences of the action of someone who decided to follow his ideas. Having to make a choice I think that the keyword is the verb understand. If someone really understands a concept, he is more acknowledged, he is more able to make his choices. the other who knows only the facts can say: the things went in that way, the things are there, but in reality he doesn`t know how and why. I can take some examples. In history I know that at that precise moment a precise thing happened. If I only know the facts i can`t understand the real reason at the base. In the end I can learn very little and have very minimal personal improvement. But if I know the causes, what makes people behave in that way, I can understand a lot, maybe learn from their errors. another example that it could be made is not quite directly related but is very similar.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Some people claim that successful people only work hard, while others like me fully agree that success depends on trying and searching. The first point i would like to make is that there are strong advantages to working in the same way. One benefit of working in the same way is not becoming any risks. You won`t fall down. For instance, my father who is a mechanical mechanical engineer. He worked 30 years for one company so he had enough money and promotions. He started as a basic engineer and he became his promotions with his hard work. He didn ` t have any stress because the company doesn`t care about him he cares only abouthis work. Undoubtedly, not taking risks means a healthy, relaxed and safe life. Though there are strong advantages to working in the same way there are some even more compelling advantages for me to work with risks. When you take risks the income will be more. For example, I`m a mechanical engineer like my father but i want to have my own company so i can take more risks to make my company bigger. These risks will be enjoyable too because i like this lifestyle. More than that, i can learn a lot of things with my risks. The income will always be bigger with risks. In addition, without risks a person couldn`t be creative enough. With the help of stress our body has got more adrenalin which means more creativity and better work.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I think that young people today have a lot of time for everything. Today generally a child has a good family, a good clean house with a beautiful garden, he has money and a lot of time, generally a good situation around himself. The typical day for young people is more or less like this: First, young people today go to school in the first part of the day, they stay in the classroom for 4/5/6 hours and then they are free. Second, in the first part of the afternoon they do some homework for a small time and then? They play football or go out for a shopping time or play with a bad machine that they call a play station all the time and they don ` t observe the world around us. And so in these days the youth lives and the time passes. In the world, a lot of countries are in difficulty.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I disagree with the statement, in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today. There are so many cars which are invented, as the year passes by there are more people who havecars, and in our society we can not live without cars. There are so many cars which are invented and will continue to be invented for the future because every year people are born and that means more cars will be made. There are people who work for the car company, such as Sam Sung in Korea. Sam Sung mainly produces cars and everyday they are inventing a new car with new colors, design, and shapes. Each year people buy new cars because it attracts them and they do not keep their cars for many years. In a certain time they all change into new cars. If there are no people buying cars then the people who work for the car company will all lose their jobs. As the year passes by there are more people who have cars because everyone wants to have an independent car. As people grow older they all want to have their own car, house, and family.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Throughout centuries, all living things have tried to appeal to others in many ways. Even in the earlier ages, people have seemed to in a way know the concept of `marketing`. The term marketing is not only private to living things on earth, but non-living things, as well. Therefore, if everything is taken as a product, they have to advertise themselves. This is the field where the marketers or the advertisers are utterly successful. They pomp up their products and advertise them by displaying them as if they were the only product to be purchased by the customers. However, most times, they are mistaken because I believe that most ads do not make products seem much better than what they really are, First of all, there is a highly crucial institution called BAS (British Advertising Standards) to which most advertisers do not adhere to a great extent. BAS typically represents a code of conduct that advertisers must comply with. Nevertheless, most of them might exhibit an ad as printed on the paper distracting the customer or a commercial on T. V.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: We only live once, and for quite a short period of time. It is possible to divide life into two halves. The first half is from the birth to the age of forty, and I am sure you will guess the second one. The descending time follows the ascending time. But is reality so binary ? A proof that young people enjoy life more than older people is that children always laugh. But why are they so happy ? Certainly because everything is still possible for them. They are able to run and play football while elderly people sit in their wheel chairs.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: For me , it is better to have a specialization in one specific subject than having broad knowledge of many academic subjects because it is easier for normal human study to one subject and spend one's time on it. People who prefer studying one language say they don't have time for that because there are many things in life that take up human's time. One reason that a human could have many social problems is that he is confused and not concentrating on his studies, so it is better for him to study one subject. Also studying one subject makes a human successful in what he is studying. For example, if a person studies business administration and spends all his time and energy on it he will become amazing in his career and job. If he had a little time he could take some courses in any thing he likes.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I agree with the statement "Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are". I think today companies are spending a lot of resources in order to have their products look better. I think there is only one reason to spend so much money to achieve a goal that should not be important to the customers. In fact, I think that, if people would think without any advertising , they would choose the product that has the best quality, and so companies that are not producing good quality products have only one solution, and the solution is to make people think their products are better than they really are. I am very interested in this issue; and so, in the last few years, I have studied a lot of marketing techniques in order to know what companies are doing in this field; however, I am also interested in being a good customer, so I want to try to avoid being a customer of a company that has a bad policy regarding marketing communication. I know that this is today quite difficult to achieve, but I feel that I really have to try it. Another reason, I want to argue for my idea, is linked with the quality of food we are eating today. In fact; today the people have an average of diseases much higher than it was several years ago. I think it is due to the quality of food we are eating, I am afraid that, despite this fact, people are still spending no more interest in order to know what they are eating. I also think the government should take some decisions in order to clarify the situation. The last reason, I would like to point out, is linked with the agricultural economic field.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I strongly agree with the opinion that young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities. Some people say this society has lots of young people who help our communities and show some examples of articles in newspapers written about young people who help the community, but I think they are particular young people. Most young people do not spend their time helping their communities. It is real nowadays. Lots of young people are personalized people nowadays. They do not think about others' situations. The only thing they focused on was their own problem. Moreover, young people nowadays do not like activity or performance, rather like staying at home. At home, they play computer games or video games. They even communicate with their friends on line and not off-line. For example, they chat and do group homework via a messenger program on a computer. It is natural that these two boys do not like helping their communities. Helping communities needs lots of activity. Studying harder than in the past is one reason, too. Young people in the past were not depressed by studying. But nowadays, study is a prior thing to young people. Oil prices are rising and a long-term depression in the economy exists so young people are concerned about their future naturally.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: A major physics break through was made when Einstein suggested a brand new theory dealing with relativity. This innovative vision was a success and Einstein had a strong physics basis. Do we need a real cure to succeed in one area or do we need to evolve gently to reach a key point? First, let's explain how seeking excellence can bring us success. For example, the computational fluid dynamics activity needs real mathematics and fluid physics knowledge so a person can then think about a revolutionary concept. By focusing on one point, we can try different methods to bypass it. Working on something wellknown helps thinking about the major issue and not about mathematics 'properties. People who keep doing well what they know are gathering knowledge, experience so they are recognized by other people for this and often called, needed to explain, show, develop this subject. Finally, as a third point, shall I mention that taking risks is not really allowed when working on a nuclear plant or when driving a war, as human lives are at stake. But, many battles were won by using surprising methods like the horse made of wood during the greek Troyes war.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: I agree with the statement as it says, the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. There are three advantages. First, as you travel in a group led by a tour guide, the tour guide will let you know every single thing you need to see on the journey. For example, if you want to go sightseeing, a tour guide will escort you to the sight. The tour guide will be responsible for whatever traveler wants to do. They just don' t have to worry about reserving a restaurant or doing some special activities. Especially when they cannot speak English or German or whatever the languages are spoken in the country where they travel to. Second, since going travelling with a group, they will definitely get along with each other and have fun. If traveling alone, you won't be able to have much fun as traveling with a group. Third, traveling on a gourp with a tour guide is much safer than traveling alone. Of course a tour guide knows about the location where it is not safe enough to go so they won't go to the dangerous side of the city. Ever since transportation has developed amagingly, the world is getting closer.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I agree with the following statement that it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. When a person wants to learn the facts first he has to have some ideas about how he can come to the end point. first of all he has to make clear about the concepts he wants to include to achieve that destiny. For example, if we want to do some project to submit to a professor we have to have some dead time to finish,then we have to concentrate on how we can finish that assignment on time. first we have to create some ideas like which books we have to refer to,how we can present that paper,the order of the paper,we have to show to someone who can give us some more information that can be included,put the paper in a clear format and submit the paper. Factual information may be the true information to learn that before we have to understand what the hidden ideas and the concepts are. when we are in a family everyperson tries to reach a conclusion so easily about others but before coming to a conclusion about that person we have to have some idea about his behaviour that is how he talks,how he moves,how he behaves in the house,then we have to make a concept about that person then finally give the facts about that person.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: People should take risks and try new things, to be successful. Life does not give us a list full of opportunities. we must create our own chances. As we look through history, we can understand that every successful person did something new. Scientists who discover incredible things or artists who think more creatively are called "successful" in our time. The thing which makes Kandinsky or Picasso is that, these people tried new things. They were not afraid to create "cubism" or other art techniques. The leaders such as Martin Luther King or Ataturk, battled even if it seems impossible. Victory can not be won without taking risks. There are so many examples to give, our own lives are also examples. For example, at school I asked a question about a murder which had happened in my country.

text: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. I agree with the following statement. I think that trying new things is good for the world and helps us to do better and have a better life. People who know about one topic want to change what they know. For example, scientists already know a lot of things about the diseases but they are still struggling to give us a better life and a better chance to stay alive. Successful people are successful because they demonstrate new things for life on earth. They want to know more because they want to improve the quality of life and also earn a lot of money. We have had computers for a long time but every time people work on them to improve them and make them easy for us to work with. I think that the world is running and all the things in this world have to run too. In the past we had airplanes but they were not like those for today. People make it faster and easier for customers. They take risks because they believe in what they are doing. As a result they win the challenge and make a lot of money. By trying new things they are learning new things and they use those things to create special machines. In the past we had a telephone which was big and was very uncomfortable.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: When human society stepped into the 21st century and technology developed, more and more people realized that understood ideas and concepts were useful. There is no doubt that ideas and concepts were mostly like a key to carrying something especially for students. I totally agree with this statement: it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. I will list three points to support my opinion. The most important thing is to gain knowledge from the ideas and concepts. I'm a student who has learned our history. For me, I think most of the ancient history is like mirrors. History reflects the current events. Also, there are many ideas and concepts in history. No matter what we do, it still comes from our history. The other factor, which is equally important, is the ability to see things from one to three. For instance, my roomate who comes from the northeast of China is good at hard science. When her lab teacher told her to finish a project, she always did it right and fast. You know what, because she got the ideas and concepts, not just learnt from facts. It is more important for students to have this skill to study. The last one but not the least one is the appearance of new technologies. Everybody knows that Japan is famous for its small techniques.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Cars were first introduced at the beginning of the last century. Ever since it has replaced the horse and carriage in most of the globe. The number of cars is on a frequent increase. I do not see in the future or the next twenty years that the number of cars will drop. As a machine,the car has proven to be indispensable. It is very hard to imagine our lives without cars. Thus with the increase in the world population and the idea that everybody needs a car then I do not see that in the next twenty years that there will be a drop in the number of cars. Car polling is a subject being discussed every where in the world. It is absolutely essential to decrease the number of cars on the streets. This will eventually make the flow of cars in the streets smoother and easier. As good as a dream, this will only make driving your car less of a hassle but will not decrease the number of cars. I remember when my father was driving me to school. I was only six years old.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I do not agree with the opinion that young people enjoy life more than older people do. It is true that young people have more physical capacity than young people,but older people have more precious experiences than young people. So older people also enjoy their life. Young people have a lot of energy and physical capacity. So it is easy for them to travel to foreign countries and able to have valuable experience. On the contrary,it is difficult for old people to have such an experience. But they are able to think and find many interesting events around them. They may not be able to have experienced foreign countries,but they are able to have enough time to love cherryblossoms in bloom in spring,and they also enjoy the rain drops in the rainy season. Many young people might not think such a thing,but I think it can also be an element for an enjoyable life. Second abundant physical capacity does not always makepeople happy. Recently,there have been serious social problems like murder , violation,and so on.

Second abundant physical capacity does not always makepeople happy.', 'Recently,there have been serious social problems like murder , violation,and so on.']

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Humans have always been against risky situations, but those who have abandoned their fears have, at least, succeeded. So, I think that the spirit of fighting against yourself is one of the most important qualities you could have. First of all, if you don't progress, you will always be at the same level, you won't reach higher positions. Unless, you are happy with this situation, this won't be a problem, but in my case this would be a disaster, because I always think the way of getting better until perfection and I think that is the feeling that moves the world. You only have to remember every morning that if it hadn't been for Cristobal Columbus, that decided to take a new route to the West Indians, probably now we would not be learning English. Second, if you get used to doing some process or task that everybody is able to do, then you become one of them. But in the moment that somebody appears who could do it better than you, then you get replaced. You are dismissed.

So, I think that the spirit of fighting against yourself is one of the most important qualities you could have. Second, if you get used to doing some process or task that everybody is able to do, then you become one of them. But in the moment that somebody appears who could do it better than you, then you get replaced.", 'You are dismissed.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Life was a box of chocolates, you'll never know what you are going to get. Yes, I start my essay with this famous sentence. I always consider life is a period of unexpecting experience. No matter whether we like the situation you're in or not, we should accept it; no matter whether we were young or old, we could not escape any of those experiences. My point of view is that we could enjoy it, with a grateful heart, seriously and hopefully. When I was young, I began to learn dance when I was four. I should practise everyday after class. I not only received numerous awards in the dancing competition, but also gained much more joy compared to my peers. I have a vivid childhood. When I grow up gradually, I still like my life full of colorful experiences. I never give up on different kinds of things, either for entertainment or for serious academic subjects. My interdisciplinary research includes economics, journalism and political science, much more broader and deeper than others. I'm content with my life pattern, I believe I enjoy my life more than the generation older than me, such as my parents. My parents are almost fifty years old now.

My interdisciplinary research includes economics, journalism and political science, much more broader and deeper than others. I'm content with my life pattern, I believe I enjoy my life more than the generation older than me, such as my parents.", 'My parents are almost fifty years old now.']

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I both agree and disagree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. Young people have more energy to do fun things. Older people already experience their frustrated lives. Although young people have more chances to explore the world than old people do, they also have more opportunities to face frustration than elderly people do. Young people have more energy to do fun things. My parents always tell me that "go explore the outside world when you are still young". Young people only have one advantage and it is their young age because they do not have any wealth and experience. Young people can enjoy their lives by exploring the outside world and trying many new things. We young people enjoy our life differently than older people do. Young people have to use the advantage of energy to explore more or we will regret it when we are old. Older people already experience their frustrated lives. After getting old, they will have merry lives if they persist in being healthy. Elders do not need to do anything for their lives, they can sleep late, read newspapers, watch TV, play golf, spend time with their grandchildren and do everything they expect to do during their free time. Older people can enjoy their lives by having a lot of free time. Elders can use this advantage to spend more time with their families before Jesus comes for them.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: When you have a mastercard in the dessert will it be useful for you while you want water to survive? This is the way ideas and concepts work. In real life, you will act naturally as you are and as you know without refering to the math or the physics. You will drink water without thinking that it is composed of hydrogen and oxygen. So, learning the facts is more important than understanding the concepts because in real life you will use the facts more easily,and you can do it naturally without wasting time thinking while there is no time. First of all, in our life when we face something we cope with it more easily with facts which includes an experience from father or brother or even from TV. However, when you want to do something you will not bring your calculator and your pen and think about it. For example, when you sit with your grandmother you know you just want someone to sit with her and hear her talking about boring things, but as you don't show that you are not bored, your grandmother will love you more. Second, we act like humans, and this doesn't mean that we don't use our minds. When you have a puncture you will raise your foot and try to control the car.
