title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree with that statement. because young people have more power than older people but they have no experience. and young people do not know how to use their energy wisely. so they behave according to what they want to do. Most of that is playing. but i'm not sure that playing out side, dancing and playing video games are enjoying their life. There's few people that work hard to enjoy their life. Young people do not have to work to earn money, they only know about spending money. but older people have to make money, most of them have family. they have to make money and save it. so older people know that enjoying life when they are adults is going to bankrupt them. But young people do not have to worry about that. Studying is the biggest enemy of young people, but many of them do not know If they study hard, they can enjoy life more than young people. When i go to the shopping mall or something like that, there are many more young people than older people. some young people spend more money than older people, play a lot, and have a party with their friends. But many older people think that enjoying life is not bad for young people so they let their children play. But if older people have the time like young people they might enjoy their life like young people. Older people want to enjoy their life.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: In fact, I can recognize that there are many companies all over the world that want to obtain customers more than others. However, I disagree with the idea that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. Becase, it is not the reality of produced and respectable for me. when the company makes advertisements, the purpose is to get the attention of buyers for products. But, the image is not related to between the customer and goods, how to take responsibility for the consequences. If the customer is disappointed only once about products, they can not recover the arguments about convenience. In addition, the primary importance is the reality of quality that they can produce the goods. The advertisements can use this technique by using the images. Sometimes, when I can find real sight on the papers what represent foods and clothes, I am interested in that, even if the appraisal is not attractive. title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities. This can be because of their selfish behaviors or not having enough time to help but it is obvious that this is not a positive signal for the future of a community. When I was a student in a college, there were some students coming from villages. They were going back to their families as soon as the holidays began, to help with their work on farms etc. Even though this situation sometimes had bad effects on their lessons, they had never thought of not helping. Now, when I compare it with the new generation, unfortunately the scene does not seem to me so helpful and willing. They all say that, they don't have enough time to help their parents even just for a few weeks during their summer holidays. The situation is similar for public buses also.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Although many people say that we will not use cars anymore in the future, cars will still be necessary tools even in the future. Namely. cars will still prevail. For this purpose, I don't agree that there will be fewer cars in twenty years. Here comes discussion. In the first place, Cars are great inventions. There are a variety of them and they help us a lot; for example, transportation- both humans and cargoes. Besides, they save time. We benefit from cars very much. Undeniably, convenient as cars contribute, we can not ignore the negative impact they have ; say, the exhaust and energy consumption. However, scientists are now trying to figure out some alternative solutions such as biodiesel. Using biological sources, cars will not cause environmental problems. Since new technology has been developing at a breathtaking speed, I am optimistic about the future. In my opinion, cars will exist, maybe changing into another form, but they will always exist. After all, we can't live in a world with cars. They are too important to be thrown away. There will be more and more cars in the coming decades. Advantages can turn out to be malign while misfortune can be a blessing.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I agree with the statement that students should understand ideas and concepts rather than learning facts. Understanding ideas and concepts is important for students to acquire knowledge. Once the Student gets an idea of the concept he can easily understand the facts. Let us take an example regarding this statement. suppose a student has a brief idea of politics then he can understand what is going on in the present world and presentcountry. He can even describe how it is going on and what is wrong and right. I state that understanding the concept is the main criteria of the subject or lecture. If a student understands a concept thoroughly he can score good marks and he never forgets that concept and ideas in his life time. This is the way of a student to develop his thinking and he can easily grasp the facts going around. Ideas and concepts play an important role in the present education system and present world. Suppose a person has nill knowledge about politics it is difficult for him to understand the facts going around. If he does nt know what the concept of work and energy he cant understand the ordinary day to day activities. Let us take english if a student does nt know the language and alphabets of english it is difficult for him to learn grammarand spellings. If a person has nill knowledge about a topic he cant write an essay. Concepts and facts are very important in all acepts. If he just learns facts he gets half knowledge of the concept. He can understand only a part of the theory not totally and completely. So i conclude that ideas and concepts play an important role in understanding facts. "As a great philosopher said, half knowledge is always dangerous. ".

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I have two opinions on this question that I will develop. Firstly, I think that it is possible that in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than today. In fact, today we have an important life problem which is the ecologicalproblem. As the climate is changing and the earth is warming, a lot of people consider, nowadays, that cars pollute and to put an end to the warming process, we have to use no polluting vehicles like bicycles,. This kind of mentality is more current in the north of europe (Sweden, Finland,. ). In those countries, they already use fewer cars than a few years ago and prefer using buses or other public transport. Moreover, in France, we can notice that the cost of petrol is very important and we arrive at a point where we can say that it's a luxury to have a car as petrol is expensive. We can imagine if nothing happens that people will develop the North mentality and apply it, to make benefits or just economies. And definitely, the number of cars will decrease. But in an other part I think that it's not possible that in twenty years there will be fewer cars than today. In fact, I imagine that from today to 2026 cars won't work with petrol but I hope with hydrogen, water or electricity or sunlight which will permit us to resolve the ecological problem we have to face. Changing the mod of combustion will permit us to have something cheaper than petrol so consequently, there will be more cars in twenty years. Finally we have to realise that in twenty years, there will be more than 7 trillion people on earth so normally the car number on earth will grow.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Students should learn facts more than understanding ideas and concepts. there are two reasons for this: effectiveness and usefulness. It is a very effective way to learn things with facts because you can picture the ideas instead of pondering them for a long time. The physics class is the most typical example of this. It is not easy to understand the gravity and speed on earth by learning formulas such as E= M 3. However, nobody would doubt the fact when the train stops there is a resistance of speed. Moreover, facts enable us to pictureize the ideas. We know how deadly atomic bombs are and they should not be utilized ever again.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN YOUNG AND OLD PEOPLE I agree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. Because young people have more aims,plans or work for the future and they have enough time for doing these things. The young people are more ambitious than older people are. When they begin to do some work they want to finish it but older people can give up easily. They can live without doing anything,they can sit or they can listen to oldies. But young people can not live without doing nothing,they always want to produce something,they want to progress. I think young people do not want to sit like old people. The young people are so energetic but the old people are so lazy because the performance of their bodies is low and because of this they can not do the things that make them tired. The young people have got special abilities because the performance of their bodies is high. They can play football,they can swim,they can run fast but old people can not do these because of their low body performance. The young people like to watch the TV but the old people prefer to listen to music on the radio.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: The tendency of the statement "Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well" is right. I think so because I am a person who acts risky and I have always had success. But before you generalize you have to know what risk means in this context. Risk according to your career is to be brave to live and work or study in a foreign country for longer than 3 months. Risk in terms of success in my opinion is to apply for another job even though you are happy and safe right now with your situation. My risk started after I finished my internship at Neuss County Council as an IT-Specialist. Working for a government facility is quite secure. The chance that you will lose your job is low. But I have thought that this cannot be everything in my life. I wanted to apply for a job in a call center because I thought that talking to people might help my problem of communication. I applied for the best call center in my region and I worked for Microsoft. Even now I am writing my thesis to graduate at Microsoft Germany. I also worked and studied one semester in the United States. The time scale here is approximately 10 months. My exchange semester in South Korea and my internship at the Korean German Chamber of Commerce and Industry were also great experiences. If I review my journey right now and compare it to some friends who never left the city where we graduated high school I can definitely say that I have an advanced status. The reason for this conclusion is because this friend of mine applied for the same internship program. So the arguments are not only my thoughts but my experience. Additionally, my friend had to admit that I always have something to talk about. And we figured out that the more information you get the more opportunities you can turn into successful projects. Right now I am preparing to build up my own business because I have contacts worldwide. And not every person in the world likes to do business unpersonally with people through the internet.

I applied for the best call center in my region and I worked for Microsoft. Even now I am writing my thesis to graduate at Microsoft Germany. I also worked and studied one semester in the United States. The time scale here is approximately 10 months. My exchange semester in South Korea and my internship at the Korean German Chamber of Commerce and Industry were also great experiences. If I review my journey right now and compare it to some friends who never left the city where we graduated high school I can definitely say that I have an advanced status. The reason for this conclusion is because this friend of mine applied for the same internship program. So the arguments are not only my thoughts but my experience. Additionally, my friend had to admit that I always have something to talk about. And we figured out that the more information you get the more opportunities you can turn into successful projects. Right now I am preparing to build up my own business because I have contacts worldwide. And not every person in the world likes to do business unpersonally with people through the internet. So my understanding of risk is to try new things. Even if you are secure in your present situation. Taking risks is not always dangerous. You only have to evaluate the k.', 'o.']

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: The tendency of the statement "Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well" is right. I think so because I am a person who acts risky and I have always had success. But before you generalize you have to know what risk means in this context. Risk according to your career is to be brave to live and work or study in a foreign country for longer than 3 months. Risk in terms of success in my opinion is to apply for another job even though you are happy and safe right now with your situation. My risk started after I finished my internship at Neuss County Council as an IT-Specialist. Working for a government facility is quite secure. The chance that you will lose your job is low. But I have thought that this cannot be everything in my life. I wanted to apply for a job in a call center because I thought that talking to people might help my problem of communication. Additionally, my friend had to admit that I always have something to talk about. And we figured out that the more information you get the more opportunities you can turn into successful projects. Right now I am preparing to build up my own business because I have contacts worldwide. And not every person in the world likes to do business unpersonally with people through the internet. So my understanding of risk is to try new things. Even if you are secure in your present situation. Taking risks is not always dangerous. You only have to evaluate the k. o. criterias which could be essential to have or to lose. People who already have a family with a wife and children are not flexible because parents have to "feed" or take care of their family members. As long as I am young I will always set new milestones to achieve my long-term goal of having a great life with my future family. And I also think it is more efficient to "risk" something when you are young rather than when you have responsibility towards others. I hope that this mind will have a great impact on my life. Good Luck!.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I agree with the statement. Most of today's youth do not care about the things that are happening around them. There are a lot of reasons as to why young people do not spend enough time helping their communities. One of the most common reply one might get when asked about the reason for not helping their community is "I don't have time for that". In most cases, the actual reason is that they don't want to. For example, when I was the NSS (National Service Scheme) co-ordinator 2 years ago, We( the co-ordinators) decided to promote the local jute industry by selling jute bags at our cultural festival "Saarang". But unfortunately the so called volunteers were reluctant to sell them and the reason they gave is that they could n't waste time by selling bags that no one purchases. Another popular reply to the questions is "What do I get out of it? ". These days young people are brought up in a competitive world and every one thinks about oneself. "If community service doesn't benefit me, why should I care? "is the kind of institute developed by today's youth. For example, the government of India recently passed a bill on including reservation of seats in national level institutes for OBCs (other backward classes).

text: I agree with the statement. Most of today's youth do not care about the things that are happening around them. There are a lot of reasons as to why young people do not spend enough time helping their communities. One of the most common reply one might get when asked about the reason for not helping their community is "I don't have time for that". In most cases, the actual reason is that they don't want to. title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: in my opinion would be great to have a broad knowledge of many academic subjects but to be more realistic i think that is better to specialize in one or a very narrow range of specific subjects. First of all i guess that it would be very difficult to learn about many subjects and that those who want to follow this way have to spend so much effort on it. I totally disagree with the statement and the reason, which i mentioned previously, is because i prefer to be more realistic, in fact i think that if you specialize in a specific subject you can improve your skill at it and you can get a job or be hired from someone more likely than if you have few notions about many things. Another important point is that if you are specializing in a particular thing you are supposed to be very interested in it and you can really enjoy studying it and go more in depth. with a broad knowledge of many academic subjects you can probably just have a shallow knowledge of them instead of studying them deeply. Finally i think that it is pretty wrong to have a wide knowledge spread among a lot of subjects even though i think that without specialists , the world , wouldn't be as it is known, i guess that it would still be as it was in the past, without all the new inventions that changed history and our way of life. i know that probably i didn't argue my ideas in depth and i am probably too confused but that is because i was trying to disguise that i don't agree with the statement because i don't believe I am able to have a broad knowledge of many academic subjects and i am disappointed about it. lol.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I strongly disagree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. There are several reasons why I have. Young people are a process to old. We should save money for our old lives. There are a lot of young people who study in college or university or career institute. They are trying to improve their' ability because they want to get a higher career and pay. Young people are healthier than old people and more flexible to get new information. So they can get more chances to get a job and earn money. Imagine that if you had to work and earn money although you were so old. It is very hard for old people. I know two people that would be good examples for this topic. One man worked very hard and saved money when he was young. So several years later, he married and he bought a beautiful house and he could spend enough money to educate his children. However another man didn't save money and didn't work hard. He enjoyed his youth. He drank beer with his friends and bought expensive clothes and bought an expensive gift to give to his girlfriend. So several years later, although he married, he still lived in a rented house. Of course, we can enjoy our life while we are young. I'm not talking about that enjoying life during youth is bad. A lot of new experiences, and traveling are important for young people. However, we need to improve ourselves more during our youth. There are some cartoons about two kinds of insect.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Risk to Succeed Success is a path, not a situation; so it needs skills for adjusting to the new circumstances, and more importantly creating own opportunities by taking risks. I also agree that successful people are different than conservative ones; because they have a different view on trying and also the skills to accomplish their goals. Of course risk taking does not mean making stupid investments, but planning and coordinatingeverything. In every risk you take there is a chance of failure, but if you get afraid of failing you will also not get successful. In the Chinese alphabet there are two icons for the risk concept. One of them is opportunity and the other one is loss. If you don`t take any risks you will never find the make benefits from an opportunity. John D.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.

I think, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today if people make the good decision in twenty years. Nowadays, the number of cars is increasing and most people use their own cars to go somewhere. By using their own cars, they waste lots of time. title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Most advertisements make products seem more efficient than they really are. Nowadays, marketing improvements, in order to sell more products, do not care about the needs of the customers and what they are looking for. The big business usually finds solutions to their economic selling problems only by taking care of their wealth, and not by taking care of what the customers need and if the product they are selling has good advertisements for its qualities, and says the truth about the content. The advertisements of a product introduce us to what we are going to buy, so it is an important part of the marketing in the business, because by looking at the advertisements of a product, the customer will decide if it is good for him and if it is what he is really looking for. Nowadays with the new improvements in the industry, making long quantities of a product is easier than in the past, and also it is easier to transport them to the stores, so they are more accessible for the customers.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree with the statement "Young people enjoy more life than older people do". Even many older people would like to say ,i did this when i was young. This statement clearly states that even older people agree with this statement. The time when young people leave their childhood , they get a lot of energies in them which they would definitely try to utilize, unlike in the older age when they cant even have enough energy to walk around. At a young age , people can do whatever they want ,like for example go to the gym , play sports with much ease. If these are also the interests of older people then they could have done it at their young age only. Since the young person has something called the young blood flowing in his body he/she will be affected by fewer diseases because at that age the immunity is at its greatest level Also, any injuries they suffer have the capability to recover quickly. Some young people actually take advantage of their age and endure themselves in disorderly pleasures like boozing , combating with others if necessary or even enjoying having sex which the older ones may not enjoy.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I am of the opinion that it is hard to say if in twenty years there will be more cars in use than today or not. Today a lot of people- almost everyone- in Germany have a car or even more than one car. A car symbolizes someone's status nowadays which is pretty said. I think that there are too many cars on the street because of the pollution and damaging the environment. Why can't people walk or drive by bike? Why can't they even use the train? People get lazy. But I presume that the tickets for a train cost too much also. It is said that the germans have no money but it is possible for them to buy a car. ? ! Where is the point? I think there is no point. But I really like that trucks are not permitted to drive on sundays for a couple of hours because the noise is gone. In twenty years people will probably be even lazier than they are today because everything becomes automatic and robots are going to be a normal use. So I actually do not think that there will be fewer cars in 2026. On the other hand, it is possible that there will be fewer cars because people will get poorer. Everything becomes more expensive nowadays and people get less money. Cars will be more expensive in a couple of years,too,and of course the gas. The gas is one of the major problems. It gets too expensive and people cannot make an effort to buy it anymore. And maybe there will be a law which says that people are not allowed to drive a car for a certain time period of the day and then people do not need a car. As a conclusion I would like to mention that it is very hard to say whether there will be fewer cars in 2026 or not. People change and time changes, too. You never really know what will happen in the future. Everything happens for a reason.

You never really know what will happen in the future.", 'Everything happens for a reason.']

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: With this set of materials I'm really disagree! Cars will be fewer is a fantastic future! In fact in recent years the number of cars on the road has multiplied! Only if an organization like a GOVERNMENT or a much more important like ONU or NATO will make some measures like laws for this problem will we see fewer cars turn around! Mysys is supported from the known of human mind! Some years ago people every day walked , went by bike or took a bus to go to work, to study or to do other things! Today man is able to buy a car and use it for his things, this because the world has changed and is changing! Many years ago people got up in the morning and thought about what the best ways to find food were? Later in the years when man got up, he thought: How can i do to live better? This is one of the means of evolution! So, I'm sure, next year people will think, for example, how many cars can i buy to live better? Another example to support my opinion you can find in recent years. Family ten years ago had only one car for the family, and that father usually used. Today for each family you can find a maximum oftwo cars, one for a wife and one for a husband. Now the number of cars is increasing and next year you will see better in one family every component of a family has a car! I know some of my friends that have two cars for each one. Evolution can help us to find ways to limit pollution for example or increase the usefulness of a car, but modern people want to have everything to take with them in theirhands. The strange thing is that this man or woman that doesn't want to walk or take a bus or move, in the evening will go to a fitness center to do a physical activity! For this reason USA which is a rich country people have becomefat! In fact, it is one of the problems of modern society. Because machines like cars are doing all the things that man did before. So i think that that sentence is very funny and fantastic! ! !.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Here are some of the funny things now. Some people think young people enjoy life more than older people do. Others do not support it. In the following , I give my own opinions about the topic. Obviously, it is a hard question to speak. In my opinion,it all depends. Yonug people are always energetic. Enjoying life for them is doing playing. They can do amazing cool things that the older can not take,such as playing tense games ,travelling to many beautiful places away from hometown. In short, they have the ability to take part in physical working things ,which is not available to the elderly. Now , whether the older is not enjoying life? The key makes sure that is wrong. Compared with young people's energy, the older would not have any advantages. Though thus,fortunately,there is one thing that the young must not have :the memory. In the older 's childhoods, lacking modern instruments,there were no computers,no colorful tv sets,no abundant money to live a good life,even no money to live. All that they experienced was rather uneasy. It must be the most important memory in their whole life. Now living in a peaceful and rich life ,both can not imagine when they were children, coming to be the truth. Finally, here is an example. My grandma , grangpa ,father,mother,sisterand I went together to chat with each other. In god we trust,this is the most wonderful memory in my opinion. We are happy to talk. Ilove my country ,my parents, my friends,many things i want are just we can be together ,then make a good lie to our no matter what happens until we die.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Some people might say that learning lots of facts is more important than understanding ideas and concepts. However, I think understanding ideas and concepts is more essential. There are two major reasons: to be confident and to be logical. To begin with, students could get confidence through understanding ideas and concepts. You might say that learning many things can make people more confident. However, you may not deny that without understanding them, nobody can use them confidently. Moreover facts are usually so common. By contrast, although ideas and concepsts are notperfect, people can get deeper knowledge by following the idea and competing. As society is getting more complex, the competition is getting fiercer, Therefore, the meaning of export has changed.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: I totally agree with this statement. Firstly, travelling in groups led by a tour guide is convenient. leading by a tour guide, you may not have to worry about the issues during the trip. For example, you don't need to think about which hotel you should choose to stay in, where you have a meal, and which cars or trains you should take. Every thing is arranged well by the tour guide. The only thing you need to do is to follow the group, see beautiful sights and enjoy them fully. Also, you can get a lot of knowledge and insight from the presentation of a tour guide. Tour guides are given good training or education in how to introduce the information about sight to tourists. In this sense, they are professional people who are most familiar with the information of sight. Having an introduction from the tour guide, I believe all of you will get comprehensive knowledge without any efforts. However, when you take a lonely trip, no one provides this kind of service and you may miss the best chance to learn about the world. Moreover, there are often many people in a travel group. I am a sociable person and I like to do many things with other people. I hate loneliness.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Is the world a circle? It sure is. When the first cars appeared at the beginning of the 20th century, (thanks to the great industrial revolution Europe was living in) it was such a phenomenon that in twenty/ thirty years almost eighty per cent of the population had one.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: The statement expressed is one thing people and particularly all researchers of mobility would like to know. From the first car that appeared in our lives, their quantity has not stopped increasing. So, which will be the future for the car? Nowadays car is an important part of our life. We use it for everything because everything is easier with it. On average a normal citizen could move around 20 kms per day in his car to go to work, shopping or whatever. That's seems to be going to be the most predictable future thanks to being the most comfortable way of living. However there is something that grows at the same pattern as cars: traffic. A lot of researchers say that traffic is the disease of the actual cities. When it appears it is nearly impossible to control it. This is something that goes against cars because when people last double time to do the same route, one question starts to appear: Do I have other means of transport? In fact our society has a variety of transport we had never imagined, but they are not so easy-going as cars are. Although it is proved that they are faster and cheaper than our cars, people do not like them. Statements like the bus is crowded, I have to walk a lot to the train station. are very common and set public transport behind cars, except when they do not depend on traffic jams and allow people to sleep some minutes more before going to work. The environment is another thing we have to take care of. The Kyoto protocol is clear in that aspect: most production of greenhouse effect gasses is caused by private transport. So it is not so difficult as in 20 years time cars will be banned from downtown, like in London Happens at themoment. As a conclusion predictions about cars are difficult to state. Everything depends on human behaviour, environmental consciense and political response. Who could imagine a world without cars? Me!.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I agree with the statement. In Korea, all high school students work only on studying. Also their parents force them tostudy. As a result, all the students lose time helping their communities. They do not even help their family. Most Korean live in apartments. Once upon a time, everyone knew all the members of their town, and there was not anyone who did not know anyone in their town, because they always cared about their neighborhoods. However the apartment does not give them any chance to meet their neighbours. One more, the jobs are getting more professional. Everyone engages in different parts of jobs. So they do not have a chance to think about their neighbourhoods and communities. So the reasons i think are studying, apartment and professionalizing of jobs. First of all, studying culture makes students not help their communities. In highschool, all the students compete with eachother so badly, they do not have anytime to think abouttheir communities. They will have to go to academies after school, and they will be so tired. After the academies, they will fall asleep right after arriving at home. This culture makes this society like that. Second, living in apartments is one of the reasons. Apartment is a separate place. All the people do not care about their neighbors and do not know who their neighbours are. The apartments are getting so big, and they will not remember who the neighbors  are.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Trying to do your best is what society asks of you. So you could improve the knowledge and skills of the country. Therefore you have to imagine and to create new concepts to be successful. Hence to know if it is useful to take risks and try new things, you have to answer those questions. Firstly, if you do your job well but do not improve it what would be the result? Secondly, if you refuse to take decisions because of risks that imply you would give a chance to your company to survive? And eventually, if you become successful, would you stop there without trying to do your best once more? Improving your job, your knowledge and trying to invent new processes, or new ways to work are manners to get a better job, to grow up the social scale. Thus, it is necessary to become successful people to reach the top of this scale. For instance, Einstein became successful after having developed his theory of relativity which was such a revolution, such new things at the time. Then successful people have to design new concepts in order to be recognized by society as successful. Improving knowledge is not the only way to be admitted among successful people. People such as Gustave Eiffel took risks. M.
sents: ['Trying to do your best is what society asks of you. So you could improve the knowledge and skills of the country. Therefore you have to imagine and to create new concepts to be successful. Hence to know if it is useful to take risks and try new things, you have to answer those questions. Firstly, if you do your job well but do not improve it what would be the result? Secondly, if you refuse to take decisions because of risks that imply you would give a chance to your company to survive? And eventually, if you become successful, would you stop there without trying to do your best once more? Improving your job, your knowledge and trying to invent new processes, or new ways to work are manners to get a better job, to grow up the social scale. Thus, it is necessary to become successful people to reach the top of this scale. For instance, Einstein became successful after having developed his theory of relativity which was such a revolution, such new things at the time. Then successful people have to design new concepts in order to be recognized by society as successful. Improving knowledge is not the only way to be admitted among successful people. People such as Gustave Eiffel took risks.', 'M.']

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Cars are one of the modern modes of transportation nowadays, which are commonly used by everyone. Cars can make our lives easier by saving us time and energy. As cars are getting more and more commonly used, the energy needed for cars is getting lesser and lesser. As a result, the energy crisis occurs, and which becomes one of the most important daily issues to us. I believe in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today, because of the scarcity of energy, and the innovation of technology. It is obvious that there are more and more cars on the streets nowadays. But has anyone aware of the huge loss of energy? Probably not. Cars will not work without gasoline.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Many people believe that the younger generation are different from the older one and they don't possess the same morals and manners as the elderly have. Or they may be less responsible or less cooperative with other members of society. I don't know from where this idea came from. I believe that every society has a bright side and a dark one. It is not fair to generalize an idea whether it is bad or good over a large number of people, because we are simply not the same. I believe that people are different and vary from person to another regardless of age or the time or the place they belong to. Each generation has its own life conditions and atmosphere that could have a great impact on people's behavior, like weather, financial status, education, civelization, culture , beliefsand society customs. What works with one generation doesn't mean that it works with another. I don't see any valuable meaning in that statement.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: I disagree with this idea that young people nowadays do not help communities. I support this idea for a specific reason. I watched a TV programme last week, and that programme is about volunteer activity. I saw many college students doing volunteer work on TV. The students support elderly people. These elderly people experienced World War 2, and the students want to listen to these elderly people's talk about the war they have never experienced before. By making good relationships with these elderly people, young people try to understand their sadness, and they try to find the meaning of peace. They said, " We don't know war, and we feel we are living in a peaceful country, but there are still many wars around the world, and people are killing, and dying more and more. We think young people should learn from war-experienced people more than from text books. "I'm also belong to a volunteer club which teaches Japanese to foreigners. Many of them are kids, and they came to Japan because their parents came to Japan to find their job. In Japan, salary is much higher than in the developing country.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Learning facts can be useful for a student, but this cannot be sufficient for them. Understanding ideas or concepts contributes to developing opinions and a critical point of view about reality. In short, understanding ideas and concepts you can obtain a "key of reading" of the world. You can begin to think with your own mind. First, students need to grow not only physically but also spiritually and intellectually. Learning facts by heart is not useful for them. Sometimes history teachers force students to learn dates and historical events by heart. Then, after one or two months, students have already forgotten all dates and all related hystorical events. It is important, in my humble opinion, to understand the background of every event, and, at the same time, have the ability to collocate it in the line of time. Once you have recorded a date, you can rebuild in your memory the historical background. This is the function of a 'by hearth learning'. Secondly, developing a critical point of view and a vast range of opinions is fundamental for a student, because it is the moment when he is building his personality. Thinking with your own mind is fundamental to living in our society, where everyone acts only in function of their own interests. In a nutshell, to live choosing your partner, or which cloak you like, or where to go when you want, is the secret of freedom.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: A New Thing Gives Success Many people believe that if a person wants to be successful, he/she should try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. I agree with this. Although there are many different definitions of the term "successful people", I believe that if a person does not try new things, he/she will never be successful. There are many successful people as examples for this statement, such as Albert Einstein and Bill Gates. Albert Einstein is one of the most famous and revolutionary physicists in history. What he did was use his radial thought on the situation with speed of light to contrast with Sir Isaac Newton's theory, which is called classical physics and contains the most basic theories on forces at that time. With this contrast, Albert Einstein established new physical theories. By taking a try on new thoughts, Enstein had physical subjects step forward to new generations, and himself became a successful person. He has said: " Innovation is more important than knowledge. "As he said, without this creative thought, physics would never have progress. Another successful person I want to show here is one of the richest people in the current world, whose name is Bill Gates. He is the CEO of the biggest software company, Microsoft. With his great sense of the development of computers, he really passes a gate toward bill.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: I disagree with the statement that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. Frankly speaking,what people with a guide can understand is only the surface of the country. I think feeling and knowing the different ways or values is the most interesting thing about travelling. And it can be achieved only by voluntary actions. In that meaning,not all but many travelers with tour guides miss the chance to enjoy the travel. First,generally the trip with a tour guide is easier to get information or knowledge of the country you are going to. You don't either have to buy a guide book nor collect the information from the internet before you leave. Even though you haven't done those things,the tour guide will tell you all you want to know,such as good restaurants, exciting amusement park or beautiful scenery. Without a tour guide you have to do all of these things by yourself,so you can get a good understanding through this action. Second,feeling and knowing different ways can be achieved by knowing the native people. But there are less chances to get along with them by tour trip. There is less free time on the tour because the guide is scheduled most of the time. Moreover, a lot of people who are of the same nationality have fewer children.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: The issue is a complex and though provoking issue that merits a closer look. Some people believe that in the future there will be fewer cars in use than there are today, whereas others oppose this opinion and support that there will be more cars than today. The latter position is certainly the stronger of the two and would be expected in detail. First and foremost, the poor countries will develop themselves. For instance, they will create roads, will sophicate themselves. Because the population will earn more money and the development of these countries, the population will use cars. For example I went to marocco and it is really amazing to see how the development of the country has influenced the number of cars in the country. Besides being important for the development of the poor countries, it is also important for the pollution. We all know that cars are not good for the environment because they pollute it. But, a new oil was discovered and will be less powerful than the older. Two days ago, the french government announced that we will use it soon and that it will be less expensive than the older one. So it will be very good because you will not be a real danger to nature and you will spend less money by driving. The position I support is the best because the car will stay useful and the public transport will not be like the cars. For example if you want to give a present to someone, you just have to put it in the case of your car whereas, if you use public transport, you would have to bring it everywhere during all the day and to walk with it, it is not very useful.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I think it's a probable idea that the use of cars will be decreasing from 2 decades now. As we think of the speed of scientific development, it's true that most people think the use of cars will be decreasing tremendously. Not only the reason for the development of technology, but also the larger exploit of natural resources. Besides, there are also some facts which make people think like that. We've often seen the news or Tv about the possibility of flying cars. Truly so, in 10 years, most technicians would assume that it would be possible to ride a flying car. And from this moment, a multitude of people will prefer to have flying cars instead of normal cars. However, these are not the only reasons. Nowadays, technicians from many kinds of field worry about the deplorable condition of natural resources. To prepare for the deploring of natural resources they're eager to make substitute resources. Furthermore, a few of them are now being used in our daily life. Also, in 20 years ,every single city or rural area will be developed as a convenient transportation place where it is not essential to ride a car to get anywhere. Naturally the number of people in use of cars would choose the use of more convenient transportation than cars. Furthermore, it's popular with all people for " Well Being". Many people have started to care about their health and exercise harder than ever.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Success means momentum in the right place, confidence and not a specific way to make it. Many people had the right answer but were in a bad time and the result was anonymous. There is not a receip but a destiny composed of events for everyone of us; at the same time, the force to make things and change events, all together in every life. We have to confront our destiny anyone is it; war, poetry , love, etc they are there in front of us to live and do and we have to follow them. Whateverthe result. That is real success in your or my life: living that we had to live with optimism, positivism and courage. We are in a complicated system of religion, social and economic structures with limits and laws that certain time with can not break. Through human civilization man has been producing a form of doing which lets us all live in community. Exploration and risks are just one form to arrive at one point, as practice and mastery of activities lead to another point both necessary for the development of people and communities. In a limited space with certain communities laws the man looks for realizing himself and finding the good check of his people or himself for a useful life. The stars have the answer or the deep ocean? ; may be the bug which walks in the backyard has the answer.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: About the statement, some people may agree that, but others may have negative attitudes. As far as I am concerned, I agree that young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities. Afterward, I will develop my opinions in sufficient depth and detail. First of all, the transportation is so convenient and developing today. People, including young  people, go everywhere so easily, Their appearances are not limited to the communities. When young people step out of the door of houses, they can take buses, taxis, or subways, even drive cars by themselves and go to the place they want to. They never even pay attention to the communities they live in. How to talk about helping their communities. Moreover, social security today becomes worse and worse. No one can warrant that it's always safe in the communities. It's possible that the bad bad guys are in our neighborhoods.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Taking risks and getting to know the unknown is an important part of being able to move forward and experiencing new things, which is why I strongly agree with the statement. Where would the human race be if our ancestors hadn't taken risks? The desire to do something new and unexperienced or unknown allows development. If Columbus hadn't taken a risk no one would have known about Amerika. Many of our scientific achievements are the results of taking risks. If no one had tried to fly (at the beginning with some strange looking machines) and with that would have taken the risk of breaking an arm or a leg we would still travel by ship (if we are willing to take the risk of sinking). Persons who took a risk are those who are standing in our books and those who achieved something in life and for the human race. But lets just look at a more personal level. If we are willing to take risks we are also open to new experiences. If a person is willing to get to know different cultures and views and is leaving her/his comfort zone, that person will learn something beneficial to her/his life. I would say that taking risks is one of my basic human needs.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: From many experiences that i have had when i travel, I have learnt that there are kinds of traveling. Some times you go with your family and want to have a nice time. And some times you just travel with some friends or your own. I really enjoy traveling with my sisters and other members of my family. But these kinds of trips are the ones that you wake up early, and go tothe museum or to any historical place. This kind of trip is when you would like to have a tour guide with you. The ones where you enjoy time with your family in a healthy way, and also learn alot from them. There are also the trips that you plan with your friends. title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Transportation nowadays is one of life's fundamental necessities. There are different types of it, such as translation on land, sea and air. Technology, in this matter, is highly important and plays a big role in the usage of cars in the coming years. It is a big part of its improvement and development. As years pass by, the population grows further. Therefore, this results from the growing popularity of automobiles in our daily life. According to this fact, in my opinion, the use of cars is going to increase day by day. Cars are one of the most used means of transportation. And it happens that it is the least expensive as well. Alot of people look at it as the easiest way to travel and move around with. On the other hand, some people think that technology is going to develop and the use of cars is going to decrease in the coming years. This might be true. In the many years to come, other kinds of transportation might be invented. They could be more convenient to use than the kinds we already have now. People have different hobbies and interests.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: ,	It is the reality on one can the reality. On the other hand, there is a good way to alter reality in our mind. Advertisements are a very effective way to create convincing thoughts about something. Every research into advertisements or advertised products indicated that advertisements have the power to manipulate people's thoughts regarding products. In our TV or Show Business times, many celebrities or popular people have been created by our Media, and it should be accepted that we love these popular people and give importance to their ideas. So the company uses and benefits from this situation. you can see many different actors, actresses and singers as part of advertisements. I believe that if a person loves Micheal Jackson and sees Micheal Jackson in the Pepsi's advertisements, after this instance, Pepsi will strongly take its place in his or her mind. Secondly, Advertisements introduce products without putting their pejorative qualities into perspective. For instance if you buy a microwave oven, you cannot nuke something near the baby or radiation sensitive people.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: There are some reasons to agree that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide. First, tour guides have knowledge of the travel place. A tour guide can introduce important parts of a place and important objects. For example, Our family went to New york, in 2004. At that time, we didn't have a tour guide. The first time, we feel ok. When we leave that country, we don't have some knowledge of that country. We feel very bad. But tour guides cover this kind of thing. Secondly, tour guides give safety. Other countries have different people, different society and different places. If we have no tour guide, we can get lost or become dangerous from other people. For example, I see an article in a newspaper. That article's story is dangerous for sole travel. In that article there are two students. Two students enjoy their trip. But on the last day, one student goes to some place. That student lost the way. Suddenly, a gangster kidnaps that student. People can't find that student. Two months later, that student's parents find that student in another city. That student seats some place. That student looks like a bulge. When a parent finds a student, that student has no legs and arms.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Old people and young people do not have the same activities, hobbies, and tastes. In fact, your life is totally different from an age to an other. While young people study older people have more responsibilities. However when people are young they are not considerate as adults so they can do what ever they wish : have fun with their friends, party a lot, not take care of the house, not have duties. However, they have to work a lot to get a good future. Young people choose in a way what they will be after. If they study well, they can have a better job. This isn't a great joy, you are in competition with all of yourfriends, you might lose some friends for better grades. So in order to have fun after school they have to be determined. Nevertheless, after school when you get a nice job well paid you will still have to work hard all your life. It's not easy, it's stressful. People can be alone, when you are at school you have the opportunity to make a lot of friends because you come from the same area, the same town, you have the same interests whereas when people get older they feellonely, sometimes because they don't like their jobs or it's hard for them to be part of the workforce. Although if you get money you can travel a lot or sometimes enjoy yourself with your family and friends, these moments are very rare. With people getting older they have new responsibilities in life : children, house and job. Finally, old people can have an enjoyable life when they are retired.

With people getting older they have new responsibilities in life : children, house and job.", 'Finally, old people can have an enjoyable life when they are retired.']

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: When I was young, I used to go to a church and help older people who were living in my communities. Since I was young, helping tasks have not been that serious but I still remember that I felt good and great whenever I helped them. However, as I grew older, I had to focus on studying high school subjects such as math, history and chemistry to enter a prestigious university. Naturally I couldn't spend my "important" time helping my communities. Now I regret that much and think young people should give enough time to helping their communities because of the following reasons. First of all, We are able to feel how happy we are right now by helping our communities. There are a lot of ways of helping communities. Among them, taking care of older people whose sons or daughters don't live near is an important task. They feel lonely and isolated so they need interests of others and giving some interests and help to them is not that hard. Through giving them help, we could feel how happy situations we live in now and love our own parents more than before. These days, young people do not give enough time to helping their communities because they have lots of things to do. However, consider wisely and just invest a little time helping the communities and feel great. life.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Most people love cars and want cars. Buying a new fancy car is a dream for billions of people who do not have a car. The quantity of cars will increase continuously in several decades. Because of cheap cars, the developing country and the desire of people increase the number of cars. First, our car technology has advanced rapidly in recent years, and it makes cars cheaper. It is hard to imagine owning a car in the 70's for a non-rich family. My father told me that there were fewer than one hundred cars in oursity when he was young. So he did not think about having the car, but he has one now. Because of the cheap car, cars will increase in twenty years than there are today. Second, there are hundreds of developing countries and undeveloped countries. These countries will develop like other countries someday, The similarity of the developing countries is growing because of the car population. In the 1950's Korea was one of the poor countries in the world because of the Korean war. But, after America's help, Korea became a modern country in 30years. In the 1950's only a few foreigners owned cars. But after 30years every single family had acar. Last, the desire of people will increase the car population. Most men want to buy a car if they have a lot of money.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I'm not completely agree with this statement. It is quite general. In my opinion there are two kinds of students. For the first type is important to understand ideas and concepts and for the other type it is important to learn facts. There is' only this difference. There are two types of subjects. To understand the first type the student must understand the main idea and the main concept, to understand the second type of subjects the students must learn facts. For example, for maths i must understand the idea and the concept to do an exercise but for italian literature i must learn facts to make an assignment. In my opinion there are a lot of subjects that are impossible to understand only with facts but with understanding ideas and facts and learningfacts, together. In my personal experience i found subjects, i needed to understand the main idea of. For example to understand the economy students must understand the main concept and must learn facts. There are concepts that the importance and influence are really great and the students are most important to understand ideas and concepts than learn facts. I.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: It is often said that these days young people don't spend enough time being concerned about their communities. Some people might agree with this statement because many young people become selfish because of the Internet. However, I am strongly against the idea of youngsters' indifference to their communities because they are enlightening the homepage of communities and helping lonely old people. To begin with, young people in modern society are interested in the way the community behaves in the area. It is commonly observed that many young people post claiming writinga on the board of community. Accordingly it is a myth that nowadays youngsters care only about themselves. For example, June Kim, one of my friends, has one son, who is 8 years old.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: It is often said that these days young people don't spend enough time being concerned about their communities. Some people might agree with this statement because many young people become selfish because of the Internet. However, I am strongly against the idea of youngsters' indifference to their communities because they are enlightening the homepage of communities and helping lonely old people. To begin with, young people in modern society are interested in the way the community behaves in the area. It is commonly observed that many young people post claiming writinga on the board of community. Accordingly it is a myth that nowadays youngsters care only about themselves. For example, June Kim, one of my friends, has one son, who is 8 years old. When he went to his son's school, he realized that the lunch menu was too bad for children to take. As soon as he came home, he began to write the principal of the school about this, and the lunch menu was changed. In addition, many young people have got accustomed to helping people. It is obvious that when many schools give the students a class score according to how often they help the poor people or weak people, students are willing to help people. Consequently, many young people help people without hesitation due to the habit in the school. For example, my son is an elementary student. I had never taught him to yield the seat to the old, but on a bus, when an old person got on the bus, my son quickly stood up and guided him or her to his seat. I was really proud of my son. In brief, I firmly believe that the young already know how to participate in the community and how to help their communities. Thr.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I disagree with the statement because in my opinion this fact will not be realized. Because of the pollution, that exists in the amount of quantity yet, the governments will take measures of security. The situation today is still dangerous because the cars in use are millions and millions of cars in the world. Even if there are better situations like in Holland and in other northern countries the situation is dramatic. In these countries, life is more natural than in other countries like Italy, because inhabitants usually use bicycles to get around. They prefer this way to the car. In Italy, for example, there doesn't exist this attitude and this education for all or about all. But according to me in the near future we, humans, will arrive at the point that we will have to constrict to use public transport even if we don't want or other services will be invented to permit us to move without acar. The essential problem is not the car like object but is how and what it uses to go, gasoline. With the many wars of today, this element is another enormous problem, for example.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I think that the statement will probably not reflect the real vision of the future. In twenty years there will be hopefully more cars than today. Cars represent a material good which everyone in modern society must have in order to keep up with the world outside. Whatever you do, you need a car. Wherever you go, you need a car. It's definitely a must. That's why i believe the number of cars will increase in the future. Also, long distances are now an everyday part of life. Most of today's jobs usually require a car in order to get around, to go anywhere. In fact it is so common now to move from city to city for work, and many people find it easier to move by car, since the bad service of trains or planes often end up being annoying and stressing. In fact, when you have to catch a train , It often happens that the train is delayed. the same happens with planes. So you find yourselves waiting for hours at the train station or at the airport, telling yourself " I should have used my car! ". That's one of the reasons I do believe people would rather use their car than take public transportation. Therefore, if people need to use the car, whoever doesn't own one, will need to buy one, and that will increase the number of cars. Besides, I believe that we should also consider the young people in order to forsee that the numbers of cars will definitely increase in the next few years. In fact we have to take into account how important kids are withinsociety. They represent the customers of the future. They will also be the cars' buyers of the future. Young kids can't wait to turn eighteen years old only to get their driver'slicence. They look forward to having their own car, because they want to feel independent, free, they want to turn into adults finally. One of the feelings to feel like a grown up man or woman is driving your car. your own car represents a piece of the world of yours. Only yours.

One of the feelings to feel like a grown up man or woman is driving your car. your own car represents a piece of the world of yours.', 'Only yours.']

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: With the increase in instant communication, advertisements have become much more popular. And nowadays most of the adverts are shown on TVs. These advertisements include from very useful products to the products that cause regretful days for customers. There are so many situations we are encountering today. How many of us rushed to a market to buy a very simple product that pulled us like a magnet? It can be a pen or a HI-FI. It doesn't matter. But there are many other products that do the same job as the advertised materials. And also, they can be much cheaper than the advertised one. But it doesn't matter. Once we are hypnotised by the advertisement on a TV channel, no one can make us buy the other crappy thing, or it seems like a crappy thing. So many feedbacks are given by customers till today about lots of unsatisfactory things. And what is more; these can be a material that was being advertised over the media. I also encountered such problems. Once I brought back a bad book that became very interesting to me with an advertisement before I bought it over the Internet. This was because of that shiny advertisement. If I had seen the book in a store before, I would never even touch its cover with my precious fingers. It was just a game played over those easily affected customers who watch advertisements, like me. Also, there are so many movies that we wanted to see so much and jumped into the cinema saloon and ran away at an incredible speed after the credits. There are even lots of people who rush to the exit door of the saloon during the movie breaks and never come back who can't resist. But as you think; these movies had been advertised so successfully before the watchers spent their hard earned money. In conclusion, it is possible to show a product much better than they really are with an advertisement. As this happens so much, especially nowadays, don't buy a product or go to a cinema or even reserve a holiday before hearing some comments. Dogcan Bicakci.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: What are the most important things we have to learn at school or at university? That is the question. Is the most important thing to have a good understanding of the main concepts or ideas? Or is it to learn a lot of information, without having a good comprehension of the main concepts? According to me, the main character for a good student at the end of school is a good comprehension and an ability for reproducing the concepts. In your argumentation, we will present some elements in order to give our own opinion. First, I think it's very important for a student to be able to reproduce the main ways of a reflexion. For example, concerning a mathematical exercise, a student will be judged about his ability to do the problem again with different information. So that's more important, it is'nt the basic information but the way of reflection. It's generally the same for every scientific topic. To my mind, it's better to understand the general ideas until of the general facts. Secondly, I believe for general facts like the history facts, students have all the time to learn them in their free time. For example, I don't think a little boy, if he doesn't know the name of the current President, will be a bad student.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: When you ask me, if I agree or disagree with this statement my answer would be: both. On the one hand are many young people active community-members. They help for example in sports clubs , take care of older people or are in a political party. All these activities support the community. On the other hand many young people don't care about the community. They are a kind of egoistic and the reasons vary. Often you hear from young people that they don"t have enough time to help their community, because they have a lot of work to do. But I think this is not the entire truth. Some people are afraid of taking responsibility for something or can " t act in teams. Moreover they are thinking only of time or money and forget that it can be a great feeling to help others. Mostly these people are great critics but they don't try to improve things by helping. My guess is they are lazy too.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: When I read this statement, I automatically think that it is right, young people enjoy life more than older people do. But if I think about it, it appears to be, in fact, the contrary. It is true that young people have discovered everything. When one is born, one has to learn and to build all of who one wants to be. Therefore, a young person has to try and to search for all that he can, to know who he is. In that sense, he enjoys life more than older people, who already know who they are. It is also true that young people have more opportunities to enjoy life than older people. The education system permits them to meet many different people, until the entrance to professional life : the student has to change his educational place all his student life, with the school, the high school, the college, etc. At the contrary, older people already have a durable placement in their company, and therefore have fewer occasions to meet other people. Finally, we know that young people do sports and have activities that older people can not exercise. That is the first impression that I had when I read the statement. But I am young and that is why my spirit only saw advantages for young people. If I am objective, it is obvious that older people also enjoy life. They have their life already lined up, that is true, but all the examples of adults around me show me that it is not a reason for us to stop their hobbies and to stay at home without doing anything to enjoy their life. My father, for instance, decided to quit my mother because he found his life too calm. He has many friends, and now he profits from everything more than, even if I am younger. With the world of today, and globalization, we can have only one job for our entire life, that is why older people have the opportunity to change their lives, to discover other things and other fields.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: In my opinion, traveling the world with a group led by a tour guide is a waste of time and money. First of all, while they give you time to explore places, it's a very short time, so you miss out on lots of things that are necessary. Secondly, crashing a bus that drives for hours and hours without knowing anybody or anywhere just isn't a fun thing to do. Finally, some tour guides don't even know what they are talking about, and don't talk when they are supposed to, so you have to take risks on picking the right time and date. Let's say that you went to an University of Harvard, and they have lots to see like the science center, and famous people who graduated from that place like Bill Gates.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: In present-day society, not having his driver's license means no access to different things coming from places, foods and jobs. That shows the importance of cars in society. Cars consume fuel, which emissions are the main cause of global warming. Therefore the tendency is to limit the negative impact of our state of life on the environment including cars. The aim of this essay will be to discuss the evolution of car numbers for the next 30 years. Manufacturing a car involves many different industries like steel, aluminium, flat glass and plastic production. Those massive industries play an important part in the economy of a country. Then, the decrease in production of cars will have an important impact on it until new orientations are made. Furthermore, many cars work with fuel, which leads to the economy of many countries too. It must be said that cars using alternative energy are emerging but as petrol will lead the market, producers will not have sufficient help and consideration. In addition to that, east countries like India and China faced an important economic development. The demand for cars will be very high for the next few years. Therefore I do,n't think that the level of cars will decrease. The solution is more to change the minds of drivers : they use cars too often : a money solution like driver's tax entreing a city like in london sociological orientation better use of common transport bus Change in the process of car consumption and so were one of the most popular in the economy of the country In some countries, statistics have shown that there are more cars than people. Lay off against car manufacturers like in california but no real impact Delocalisation in eastern countries, growth of China and india so more cars will be constructed in theseareas. So the real question is not to know if there will be fewer cars in use in the future but if those cars will be more against the environment. Policies regarding the environment are becoming more and more present in European countries and so the industry has to adapt to these laws. N.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: It`s quite common to hear judgments about young people nowadays. It`s even quite popular to think that they are poor in spirit and too selfish to spend time on someone else'slife. Well, I think It`s the way adults usually use to solve some of their internal problems, completely not tied to what the reality is. The reality is that young people nowadays spend much more time helping their community than before, and I think these habits will increase in the future. Modern life has brought us to stress our time in order to do as much as we can: or better, in order to earn as much as we can. This behaviour entails an important aspect: the rising of a new concept of common culture. What I want to say is that now every young person is sufficiently prepared to understand that it is better to work and to make efforts for the community instead of behaving selfishly. Any good action can only improve the common happiness, but our happiness is just inside this commonwealth. It`s even more and more evident how young people are trying to destroy old stereotypes of thinking about what is different. Although until a few years ago hostile behaviour among human races was deeply radiated in common thinking, new social dynamics are strongly addressing young people to accept every kind of difference. Thus making it easier and faster the growing of a new common sense of belonging to a community; and it ` s this new sense of belonging to make us spend more time with this new family. Anyway the increase in the number of young people involved in volunteer groups , such as medical teams in poor areas of the world or even very young people helping elderly people , is a confirmation of what I ` vestated. In conclusion, I can even well understand why many adults think that most young people are poor in spirit : are not they to teach us in university classes that the only god we must pray to is money? And the only way to earn money isn`t time?.
