title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: I agree with the given topic. I think that it is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects. I am an engineering student i feel pretty good about my subject when i am talking with another engineer. where as it is very difficult for me , to talk about any other subject with another person. Recently i went to my home town and met my friends. They are all art students. At that time i had to talk about the history of the world's richest culture. They talked well but i could not even talk a single word. At that moment i felt very bad and thought that if I had some knowledge about some other topics I would definitely be able to say something. We are living in an interdependent society that means we have to help others and take help from others, we must know about our duties and responsibilities and some famous people. It requires knowledge of some subjects which are knowledge about history and geography and political sciences and knowledge about some biology. Last year summer college had a big accident.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Success is a very common word that people use very frequently to express their ambitions. It is probably the best goal someone may have and it can be reached in every field, but how? The main element needed to have success is studying. Studying will always bring somewhere better than where you are now and this is another great goal to which you should always aim at in your life. Another fundamental factor is risk. Risk is not a very common word, because when it is used, it usually represents a very difficult and intense situation. Apart from businessmen, people don't like this word very much. As a matter of fact, it is mainly used in business discussions. In economics, risk is what leads to success. For instance in stock exchanges, no one who hasn't ever risked is successful, and never will be. In business, you are compelled to gamble on tons and tons of factors that will determine the way through of your day and consequently of your life earnings. There is a great motto that states the importance of this curious behaviour risks, no earns! "It is a hundred percent correct and it illustrates very exhaustively what people's behaviour should be like. Yes, because risks are not to take only in business fields. Risks are at the basis of worthwhile living, morally and economically speaking. If this behaviour occurs, people would not do what they already do well, but they would improve. Improving implies some risks initially, but paradoxically in the end, it always brings you to riduce risks and gains in your life. So in conclusion, key advice to be given is:"Always improve, because in life there is always more to learn about and more to risk on. ".

The main element needed to have success is studying. Studying will always bring somewhere better than where you are now and this is another great goal to which you should always aim at in your life. Another fundamental factor is risk. Risk is not a very common word, because when it is used, it usually represents a very difficult and intense situation. Apart from businessmen, people don\'t like this word very much. As a matter of fact, it is mainly used in business discussions. In economics, risk is what leads to success. For instance in stock exchanges, no one who hasn\'t ever risked is successful, and never will be. In business, you are compelled to gamble on tons and tons of factors that will determine the way through of your day and consequently of your life earnings. There is a great motto that states the importance of this curious behaviour risks, no earns! Risks are at the basis of worthwhile living, morally and economically speaking. If this behaviour occurs, people would not do what they already do well, but they would improve. Improving implies some risks initially, but paradoxically in the end, it always brings you to riduce risks and gains in your life. So in conclusion, key advice to be given is:"Always improve, because in life there is always more to learn about and more to risk on.', '".']

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: Although it's important to learn ideas and concepts in textbooks, I disagree with the statements that it's more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts because the ideas and concepts are originated from facts. For example, capitalism, one of the economic ideas, was generated around the 19th century in the United Kingdom when they made stock markets. This idea was generated from the fact that the stock markets were made. The facts give the ideas and concepts when people try to understand the phenomenon of facts. Moreover, the new facts are not defined as ideas and concepts immediately since the ideas and concepts are produced through discussion of facts. It takes time for people to generate ideas and concepts through the long procedure of discussion and comprehension. Still we don't know why the pyramids in Egypt were constructed.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: "The world will change" was what our teacher told us one day. For my part, I think there will be fewer care in the twenty years than there is today for many reasons. First I think that the sources of energy will decrease, especially oil. So it will be hard to provide oil for cars. Now the oil price is over 70$. ! Unless they discover new sources of energy. In addition to prices of oil will get higher and higher. People will have problems getting gas for their cars. Second thing, the population of the world will increase. So it will be hard to drive because of traffic, and it will take a long time to move from one place to another. As most studies stated, and as many people immigrating from poor countries to the developed ones. Third, discovering new means of transportation such as subways, or express trains will be a good reason that people will leave cars. Because they are cheaper, faster, and safer. Also, Maybe there will be a new "generation" of means of transportation like rockets.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: There are good things and a few not very good things about travelling in a group led by a tour guide. The good thing is that you will get to meet a lot of people and you can also have friends and family in the group the group will have a person who will be your guide during the tour and know perfectly the places that you are going to visit and will give you an explanation of every place you visit during the tour and this guide will also answer all detailed questions about the places; I suppose that if this person is a tourist guide he should have study very well about the places the we would visit. You will get to meet a lot of people in the group and maybe become friends. You could not get lost with I guide because of what I mentioned before he has studied the places and knows the places very well. That is why he is a tour guide. He will give you advice on where you can shop, where not to go, which places are better than others, very good restaurants, and maybe have a party for his group! The not very good reasons for traveling in a group and led by a tour guide are that you have to stick with the group and follow them to all the places and you cannot wonder around to get to know the places you want to go and wake up late, have a very comfortable vacation. If you travel alone you can always get all the information you want and maps of the places you want to visit. You can make your own tour and be your own guide. And you can always find better places to be.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: I definitely agree with the statement, and I think the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide for three reasons. To travel where I have never visited before, it is hard to choose where to see around. When I visited Italy, I had a hard time scheduling where to go. There are many churches, cultural monuments, and famous concert halls to visit. I could not choose where to go first or where I definitely should go. However, when I travel with a group and a tour guide, the tour guide planned everything and scheduled everything efficiently. I do not have to waste time making decisions, and also I never miss famous places to visit. Sometimes it is hard to find a restaurant when I travel by myself. Usually, the place to travel is where to travel for the first time. So I have no information about the price of food, what to wear, and whether it tastes good or not. When I was a student and travelling to Italy, I was a backpacker. Since I was young, I have not spent much money on eating expensive foods.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Success doesn't happen overnight, it takes lots of work and dedication. I believe that successful people are risk takers. In this paper I will emphasize my opinion with three points: to be successful, people need to make mistakes, to be successful people need to take risks, to be successful you people to explore and try new things. First successful people are not perfect, they learn from their mistakes. By making a mistake a person diminishes his experience. The person also opens his mind to new ways of doing things. Often when someone makes a mistake he tries not to replicate the mistake later on. Let's take as an example Alexander Graham Bell, when he invented the telephone, he made lots of different adjustments some work some didn't. Second, in order to make a mistake a person needs to be willing to take risks. If no risks are ever taken there is not a mistake that can occur. The same things happen over and over again.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. In modern society, there are more and more entertaining resorts for young people to enjoy. Such as Wonderland in Canada, bars and clubs. The most important thing is young people's ages and hearts. As the economy increases all over the world, everything is changing. The buildings, people's dress, cultures, fashion, and transportation. The reason the world is developing is all because the way modern thinking is changing. title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: One of the big topics in this new century is the pollution of our world, especially of the air. To give our children a chance to live healthily in this world, there are some possibilities for air pollution: one of the most factors that cause air pollution is our cars. So a lot of states and countries think about strategies to increase the sum of cars in the next 20 years. They invest money in new and more economic bus-, train- or tube-systems. Using this transport system in the future has got a second advantage, too. In every big city, there is a parking-problem. But the cities are rising, too. And so every month there is a parking space for a new building. In future more and more people won't have an other possibility for arriving at their jobs than to use these public transport systems. So cars will be less on our streets. Another reason to disagree with this statement is the oil. In some years, there won't be as much oil as today on our earth and therefore the petrol price will rise in regions because many people won't be able to pay for it. Ok, there are inventions for non-petrol cars. But nobody really supports that because of the big influence of the oil industry. So a lot of people will sell their cars and move with public transport or trains. The third reason to disagree is that there will be new kinds of transportation-systems in 20 years. Perhaps everybody has got a small plane. We won't have any streets. Only fly in the magnetic field of our earth without any petrol or electricity. Or we get beamed to every place on earth like in "Spaceship Enterprise "? 20 years, that's a very long time, and looking back to the last 20 years, a lot of things, nobody thought about, have been invented.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Nowadays young people do not give enough time to helping their communities to some extent. Statisticians have shown that the number of participants in non-profit organizations has dropped dramatically over the past ten years. Young people have very much become money oriented and focused. I believe governments should come up with criteria and standards whereby they will give preference to awarding government projects, student schalorship to those who participate in serving the community vocally. In addition to that, there should be an awarding system where community servers will be announced publicly and their photos will be displayed publicly. There should be a top-down approach where the top people in the country set as role models and volunteers take part in helping their communities. I will recommend a cyclical dynamic process for such top down approach as follows "Policy, Plan. Perform. Monitor & review. It begins with commitment from the top , visibility as well as setting policy. This should be followed by proper planning, where the government has to prepare the infrastructure e. g.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Is a group led by a tour guide the best way to travel? I think it is, because when you go to a new place, sometimes you don't know the city well or you could take the risk of being missing. If you go to a new place, it would be better to be guided, so that if you have any doubt or any question, you will be sure that the guide will have the answer. You do not have to be concerned about knowing everything about the places, the buildings, the ways and you will only enjoy the trip. On the other hand, if you travel by yourself, without a guide, you must ask for some address or building name if you do not know it. It would take more time, it could be frustrating and it could make you spend a lot of money on taxis, buying maps or getting back from wrong places. A tour guide is a person who knows the places that he or she is showing, and he or she would teach you some history, because he would talk to you about the places you are visiting, its origin, its name, about what it is made of and all kinds of things that would take a lot of time to learn. It is safer for a person to travel in a group and with a tour guide because they do not take the risk of visiting dangerous places. The tour guide would tell you what places are safer, at what time is better to be and the right moment. Travelling in a group could be better because you can learn from the other people. If you don't know the name of a specific building, another person could know and tell you.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I disagree with that statement. Because i don't believe that in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today. Because the population of the world is continuously growing, there will be more people living on the earth than today. So it means people will need more cars for their requests or anything else whatever you want to call them. If we look back, our past will show us, we are always using more by time. For example, if we used 10,000 cars in the 1920's, we would use more than 500 million cars today. This is only one example, there is always a good table showing us we always use more cars than last year. And it will continue to go up like this. Lets look at it from a different point. There are car facilities and others like tear producers etc. So, they will always need to be developing new models of car and other parts. And we are drivers or whatever we call, shortly people will be changing their cars to another new car. In this while other poor people , i mean who do n't live in good lifestyles or conditions. Then as you see there will be two carsin use, if you think other people do thesame too, so can you tell me, in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today? There won't be fewer cars in use in the future. If you look around and think that, when you were child there were fewer cars, but when you were grown up, if you think carefully then you will see that cars are raising with time. Now look around, how many cars there are? Was it less than the time you were child? No It's not. Because there are more cars in use now than in previous times. Finally i will say we will see many cars in use in the near future. If we don't find solutions to traffic problems, we will be in big trouble. We will waste time in traffic and we will waste gas for nothing while waiting in traffic. Also i think patrol companies won't let it be less cars. Because how many cars there are, they will sell that much gas and earn money. We can give many examples like these. Hopefully there won't be many cars than today for a more healthy life. But my brain doesn't tell the same things. I think we need to work hard for this big problem. We need to teach people for social transport vehicles like buses and others. For a healthy life we also need to use exercise.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Have you ever hoped that you would be 10 years younger or more? These days many people want to be young because when they think they are too old, they can not do many things. Consequently, I agree with the statement. young people enjoy life more than older people do. Making mistakes is not acceptable to adults. For example, if a person spread water on the carpet. If the person was a young person, people would understand and say "you did this because you are young. "However, if the person was an adult, people would think the person in a bad way such as, weird or selfish. Consequently, doing something or going somewhere is much more careful for adults. And yet, mostly, people feel fun when they are in a different place or situation. Therefore, for an adult it is difficult to plan out. For that reason adults have so much experience, it is easy to feel fear. When I was young my mother had a rice cake in her throat. Accordingly, she has not eaten any rice cake until now. Also she does not try to eat any rice cake even though it tastes so good. However, when she sees any kinds of rice cakes, she said it reminds her of the time. Consequently, to her it is really hard to try. Because older people are old, they have to think about their health and it is really hard to be fine after they have had an accident.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Whether young people enjoy life more than older people do or not draws a complex issue on the topic. Some people may say young people have a lot of fun, but the old do not. While others may oppose this opinion. If I have to choose a view, I will personally support the former claim. First of all, Young people have more opportunities to have fun from various aspects of society than old people do. People usually take it for granted that the conception of young means having fun, which is why our society provides more facilities for young people to do so. For example, the manufacturers produce various toys for babies, children, and even young adults. More over, many topics on TV concern the young, seldomly with the old. When I turn on my TV, I can find a lot of children's channels as interesting as Disney. In some countries, like China, there is only one child in a family. So both parents and grandparents will love her or him as precious as an apple, and provide her or him with all kinds of opportunities to have fun. Additionally, young people have a lot of energy and fewer responsibilities, which makes it easier for them to have fun. On the other hand, the old have to earn money in order to sustain the family. For instance, my father always looks tired after he comes home from his office and then he even refuses himself to have fun with me, which makes me very upset. As a wise man said (and I paraphrase ), " Time is money, and time is treasure". These words make those adults and olds think that they can not waste their time having fun at all, which might not be totally correct. Admittedly, our society provides old people with more and more opportunities and encourages them to have fun, especially when they get retired. After retiring, more and more old people feel bored and lonely at home. So they try to make more and more opportunities for themselves to have fun. The city government usually organize Senior Clubs which includes gym facilities, dance center, and so on. Even don't mention the chess clubs, singing clubs,. etc.
sents: ['Whether young people enjoy life more than older people do or not draws a complex issue on the topic. Some people may say young people have a lot of fun, but the old do not. While others may oppose this opinion. If I have to choose a view, I will personally support the former claim. First of all, Young people have more opportunities to have fun from various aspects of society than old people do. People usually take it for granted that the conception of young means having fun, which is why our society provides more facilities for young people to do so. For example, the manufacturers produce various toys for babies, children, and even young adults. More over, many topics on TV concern the young, seldomly with the old. When I turn on my TV, I can find a lot of children\'s channels as interesting as Disney. In some countries, like China, there is only one child in a family. So both parents and grandparents will love her or him as precious as an apple, and provide her or him with all kinds of opportunities to have fun. Additionally, young people have a lot of energy and fewer responsibilities, which makes it easier for them to have fun. On the other hand, the old have to earn money in order to sustain the family. For instance, my father always looks tired after he comes home from his office and then he even refuses himself to have fun with me, which makes me very upset. As a wise man said (and I paraphrase ), " Time is money, and time is treasure". These words make those adults and olds think that they can not waste their time having fun at all, which might not be totally correct. Admittedly, our society provides old people with more and more opportunities and encourages them to have fun, especially when they get retired. After retiring, more and more old people feel bored and lonely at home. So they try to make more and more opportunities for themselves to have fun. The city government usually organize Senior Clubs which includes gym facilities, dance center, and so on. Even don\'t mention the chess clubs, singing clubs,.', 'etc.']

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Knowledge "Its better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject. "I agree with this statement because knowledge saves alot of people from a lot of dangerous things. "A little knowledge is dangerous. "I have faith in this saying lets take medicines such as pain killers as an example. People with a little knowledge of medicine think that taking more pain killers will help kill the pain faster, On the other hand well educated people will realise that taking overdoses of pills will have a lot of side effects on the person who takes these pills, thats why a person must have a broad knowledge of many academic subjects. This doesn't mean that the person must be well educated in everything, because the saying says: " A man of all trades is master of none. "It's hard to know each detail of every thing in life because this will refine your focus on the important thing in each subject in life. My advice to every one is to try to educate your self in every thing and this doesn't mean going through details in every thing. But each person must have a special subject to know every thing about, and try to gain information from different people you meet in your life with different education because: " Christmas comes but once a year.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree with this statement. People who succeed in business usually try new things and take risks. To begin with, only new ideas can succeed. An old idea wouldn't make you rich or popular. only new ideas do. people are usually interested in new things because they think it is cool or trendy. For example, many people bought new types of video game like the Wii or Playstation3 in Japan. Some people bought these games on impulse because the news programs or TV showed a great system about them and made you buy them. Now,how about old type of videogames? Will you buy it? The answer is no even TV suggested it because you already know what the problem with these old games is and you can find out that TV's information is not always correct. Another reason is that risky decisions will be worth a lot. Many rich people try very hard to become rich. In another ward, they took many risks to aim for their goals. So risks and success are related. If you take risks, you might fail. However, you might do well. When the risks that you took are greater, the prize is also great. That's why people who didn't take risks wouldn't have success. It is similar to gambling. For example, my uncle went to the casino last year. He first played slot machines which needed only 10 cents.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I disagree with the statement that is said about how advertisements are. There are several reasons. Firstly, an excessive advertisement confuses the consumer. Usually,the consumer buys the goods based on the information that the company advertised. When the goods are not what they thought about, they must be confused. For me, I want to lose my weight, so I buy the exercise machine. The advertisement said I could lose my weight without suffering, and that was very attractive to me. I immediately decided to buy the machine. Once you use it, I found that it is very difficult to use and demanding. I gave up using the machine. Secondly, I think that the companies by which the excessive advertising prevailed lose their repetition. As I suffered that problem mentioned above, I do not have any confidence in the company. The company still sold the same machine and the progress method of losing weight, I perfectly doubt for the advertisement, if they were actually good for me. Thirdly, I am not good at my country's society.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: The statement asserts that in twenty years there will be fewer cars in use than there are today. However, I completely disagree with the statements for several reasons. First of all, There is no substitute for cars. Today, there is a lot of public transportation like buses, subways and monorails. However, it does not reduce the number of cars these days. In fact, the number of cars is increasing rapidly these days. People use their cars for personal reasons like shopping and moving their luggage. Taxies might substitute this purpose however it costs a lot. No one wants to use taxis for personal use because of the cost. In my opinion, nothing can substitute the need for personal cars. Second, there are many countries in Africa and all over the world. They don't eat food well.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: Can we say that success and creation are linked? The main point is to make a difference between financial success and personal success. Through a financial point of view. New things are not always successful. Indeed, success as well as failure are parts of the risk. For instance, when you gamble in a casino, you can win but you can also win. Maybe the first thing is to analyze what is to be successful. A successful person can also be the one who tries what he really wanted to try, the one who is not afraid of realizing his dreams. The issue of the try doesn't influence the value of the act. Which is taken into account is the will to realize his projects and achieve his dreams. Therefore, we can say that people who act and react are successful people. They attract admiration and respect from others. Indeed, taking risks and trying new things are a proof of courage. Trying new things can turn a person into a leader. Even if the try ends up being a failure, because it is new, it is always a start for something else new. In the Arts, Surrealism, after the Second World War was rejected in favor of Existentialism.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: In my opinion, young people really enjoy their life more than older people do. As we see some examples, we can figure out how much young people enjoy their life. Using those examples, we can generalize young people. Young people have enough time and are healthy, so they can try many things which they want to do. For instance, if old people want to do sky jumping, they usually can not do that because their body is very weak, but young people can do that without worrying about physical problems. Besides, if old people want to travel the whole world, it will take a lot of energy, but old people can not deal with that. On the contrary, young people can do that well. Usually, old people have children and family, so they have to protect them against poverty.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: A successful human would try different newer things in his life than the older things he is used to doing. Changing your habits is not an easy thing, but one is urged to do it for a number of reasons. A successful teacher should renew his lectures. This indicates that he is up to date and also refreshes his mind constantly. Also, this gives him a good reputation among other colleagues. Take me as an example, I teach pharmacy students at a Jordanian university, I keep getting newer information from different books and resources and include it in my lectures. It is troublesome, as it seems, but it keeps me fresh in information and with a good status among my colleagues. Also, this might give you the chance to create newer things. If you are a chemist, and you are constantly trying to change your ways of making, or synthesizing, chemical compounds, you might come up with less expensive methods. The newer method is considered an invention in its own, and it also saves money. Also, you might think of changing your view, clothes or even your hair cut.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.

Christophe Colomb was a famous sailor of the past centuries, he was a risk taker and that characteristic of his behaviour led him to discover America although his life and all the crew were in danger. The curiosity and the risk keep them alive, they need it. The world wouldn't be so fantastic if people were all cowards! The curiosity and the risk keep them alive, they need it.", "The world wouldn't be so fantastic if people were all cowards! Ernesto Che Guevara was a good doctor in south America but his political ideas were so strong that he left everything to join the Cuban revolution."]

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: I had a trip to Che-ju island in my country, Korea, with my friends, and it was a trip that was led by a tour guide. After the journey, there were more bad memories than good ones, for these reasons : choosing visit places, and the problem of extra fees. Regarding my experiences, I disagree with the opinion that a tour group led by a tour guide is the best way to travel. First of all, People robbed their rights to choose the spots to visit, If the travel team is organized and led by a tour guide, people on the team have to follow the schedule which is made by the guide. For example, I couldn't visit the museum which exhibits the numerous kinds of unique plants grown only in Han-ra mountain in Che-ju island. Instead of that, we merely followed the typical travel courses like teddy bear museum, and restaurants that sell black pig. What  a waste of time! ! I can see such a thing not only on the island, but in my town.

After the journey, there were more bad memories than good ones, for these reasons : choosing visit places, and the problem of extra fees. title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: People perceive enjoyment in different ways. Enjoyment for me may mean playing soccer but at the same time enjoyment for my grandpa may mean meditating or reading. I may endorse enjoyment in a different sense. Enjoyment is a personal view and not a general one. I would refute the statement that young people enjoy life more than older people do. Enjoyment is an aspect of life in its own way, carrying a special meaning. Before the teenager, playing with friends for long hours may be the ultimate source of enjoyment for kids. During the teenage years, chatting with friends on the phone,talking to the opposite sex may be thrilling & enjoyable. Typical pangs of adolescence as we call it. Post teenage,i. In college life,we may like to hang out with our friends for parties,movies,festivals etcetera. It would certainly mean enjoyment. Pre-marriage job life would add some other kind of dimension to the definition of enjoyment of life like going out shopping.

title: Young people nowadays do not give enough time to helping their communities.
text: Nowadays people are living in a mixed world with all kinds of generations and where the community grows faster. How can you help your communities with the time you have? ? ? First of all, in my opinion, I am a student of twenty years old, and I would say that in your everyday life,you never find any time for all you want to do. As far as I am concerned,I would say that giving time to other people, or being investigated in an activity requires a lot of human qualityand a strong engagement. It might not be easy to help our community when you have responsibility at work, at home, with children. In order to manage a good way of living we have to make choices at any time during our own life. Secondly , we can consider the problem from a different point of view. If you are living in a huge town it will be more difficult to help the community than living in the country. Thanks to their small village in the country,everybody knows everybody. The fact of the densification of the population,it's easier and faster to link and create central meetings. Obviously, the democracy will grow up with the help of younger people. I don't really agree with the fact that young people do not give enough time to the community. For example, sometimes in your jobs ,the director asks you for high responsibilities, even if you didn't choose them you have to control and help your company. But what we forget is the fact that it is probably for biological research, and that the community progress.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: It is often believed that successful people love to take risks and new challenges rather than to carry on with their regular routine. I agree with this statement and feel that success does play an important role in accepting challenges in life Success in any field of life,helps one to think more positively and confidently about his/her decision making ability. It urges one to look for something more in life. I can give an example here. When I was a kid, I wanted to learn to ride a bicycle. After many attempts and repeated falling, I finally got grips with my problem. It made me happy and I was elated at my achievement. But my urge did not stop here. Now I wanted to learn to ride a bike,because i felt i could take on this challenge effectively. If I had not been successful the first time,i might not have taken any steps to learn something new. Even in a professional environment,the things which you already know make it routine rather than a challenge. what keeps any successful man/woman going on in his/her field of work is the enthusiasm to find new challenges and his ability to pursue those challenges. Today there is a cure for cancer.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: We can see all kinds of advertisements on TV. Some of them are creativity and make the products look useful. What is the purpose of the advertisement? We can understand the following reasons. First, customers are willing to buy the product after watching the advertisement. Second, Give the customers enough information about the product in a short time. Third, there are many competitions in the same kind of product. Even though the sales people understand their product is good, customers will never know if they never buy it. All they can do is to show their products in advertisements. Although sometimes it seems much better than they really are, it is just strategy. Other companies also use the same method. We all know that if the advertisements want to be watched as many viewers as they can, we should put them in the popular programs. It costs a lot of money. If we cannot give customers enough information about what the product is, it just wastes money. The best way is to pretend it is really attractive and useful. Sometimes customers do not understand what the difference between one company's product and others' products is. The only difference is the advertisement. Every company tries to make their product look better than they really are. In conclusion, although I would like to buy the product better than it shown in the advertisement, i do not how to choose the product if i have never used it.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: many people have a different point of view about the idea of enjoying life. some think that young people enjoy life more than older people do. in contrast to this some think that older people have become knowledgeable about life and so they can enjoy it more than young people. i personally agree with the second idea because i think that young people have more important problems than old people, so they can't enjoy life as much as old people. First of all, older people have met life a long time ago and their stress about the future is less than young people, so they can enjoy life easily. for example, many young people have a concern about the future. they feel stressed about their schools, jobs or career. they may be afraid of graduating from their university with low degrees or finding a job with low prices. however older people generally don't have such problems because their schools are finished, their jobs are suitable. i can explain this to my family. i have a concern about my career because sometimes i think that i will not finish my university or even if i graduate i won't find a good job. maybe i will not be able to find a handsome and intelligent man to love me. so i am afraid of being a lonesome and poor woman in my future. however, when i see my father and mother, they are more relaxed than me. they have worked twenty five years and they bought two houses and one car, their two little daughters grew up and they studied at good schools. therefore now they can spend their time and moneytravelling. last holiday, they went to Paris because they wanted to see what Paris looked like! however i can't go with them because i have four exams and i have to study all day. Secondly, older people have money and time to enjoy life. young people need money and their pocket money is not enough for some activities. however, when a person has a job and he is paid well, he can do what he wants in his holidays and free time. for example, even if two people enjoy reading books, one who is younger can't buy a book that he wants, the other can buy all of the books the writer has written. also, younger people can't find free time to do it. for instance, i like watching films and i know it is a simple activity. however i can't do it everytime because my school is very hard. also i live in a big city and i don't have a car so my time is spent on the buses.

First of all, older people have met life a long time ago and their stress about the future is less than young people, so they can enjoy life easily. for example, many young people have a concern about the future. they feel stressed about their schools, jobs or career. they may be afraid of graduating from their university with low degrees or finding a job with low prices. however older people generally don't have such problems because their schools are finished, their jobs are suitable. i can explain this to my family. i have a concern about my career because sometimes i think that i will not finish my university or even if i graduate i won't find a good job. maybe i will not be able to find a handsome and intelligent man to love me. so i am afraid of being a lonesome and poor woman in my future. however, when i see my father and mother, they are more relaxed than me. they have worked twenty five years and they bought two houses and one car, their two little daughters grew up and they studied at good schools. therefore now they can spend their time and moneytravelling. last holiday, they went to Paris because they wanted to see what Paris looked like! however i can't go with them because i have four exams and i have to study all day. Secondly, older people have money and time to enjoy life. young people need money and their pocket money is not enough for some activities. however, when a person has a job and he is paid well, he can do what he wants in his holidays and free time. for example, even if two people enjoy reading books, one who is younger can't buy a book that he wants, the other can buy all of the books the writer has written. also, younger people can't find free time to do it. for instance, i like watching films and i know it is a simple activity. however i can't do it everytime because my school is very hard.", "also i live in a big city and i don't have a car so my time is spent on the buses."]

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: As is known to everyone, there are lots of advertisements that have been created during this medium period. some people think advertisements make products seem the same as they really are. on the other hand, some people don't think so. In my opinion, i agree with the statement that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. The reasons why i agree are as follows. First of all, advertisements become more creative and interesting, owing to attracting more buyers to buy their products. If the advertisements are really boring, there is no one who will be persuaded to buy their products. What's more, there are lots of products in the world. Some sellers suffer more pressure about how to get an important role in this market, As a consequence, the advertisements will show more information about such good products they sell. Even though, the products are really not as good as the advertisements present them to be. Worst of all, it's a negative cycle. Lots of advertisements follow this kind of trend to gain more profits from consumers. By way of conclusion, i totally agree with this statement that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. In order to attract more buyers and then earn more money, the advertisements make products which become more amazing and creative, but they really are not. It is a really negative cycle in our society. However, many people don't pay much attention to this issue. What a pity it is.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Most young people and old people enjoy their lives. Some people might say that young people do not enjoy their lives because they have to study hard and find jobs for their future. However in modern society most of them enjoy their lives more than older people. Older people have to earn money for their kids and have responsibility for their own families, but young people have various ways to play such as computer games and TV. They can also have a lot of food if they want because of their parents.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: It is not better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject. It may cause a huge problem because if a lot of people know a little about many subjects, how do they teach something in detail about a specific subject to another? Also how do people become a teacher with this little information? How can knowledge be improved with a little information about a subject? That is why it is better to specialize in one specific subject than to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects. Lets consider that there is a little population on a small piece of land and they know little information about every academic subject like geography, biology, history, physics. etc.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Yes i agree with the statement that young people enjoy life more than older people do. I think in all respects young people enjoy it more than older people. I think younger people have less responsibility than older people. If any one has some responsibility they may not enjoy it like less responsibility people. I observed some points in my friends. Some of my friends do not have any restrictions or responsibility. They enjoy a lot of everyday life. It is not possible for older people because mostly they have some responses during old age. Like their children's education on other financial problems. But these young people dont have such types of problems. And some more reasons for this are health problems. Young people are more active than older people or not. Young people can enjoy themselves without taking any rest for so many hours. Where as olders cannot do this. A better example of this is every weekend i prefer to go to some pubs in my city. I can find a lot of youngsters and olders. I observed that young people dance till late at night. But it is highly difficult for older people. Another best example to state this opinion is my life style. I am a very crazy person. I always want enjoyment in my life. I have a lot of friends.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: I agree that most advertisements make a product seem much better than they really are. These days the advertising has become so popular that some people even have this belief that they can not sell a product at all with out advertising it on television or radio or wall posters. The first and the foremost thing in most of the advertising industry is presenting something bigger better or more unrealistic than the usual product. These days there are advertisements for everything from a mole hill to a mountain. And these days with the advancements in media (radio, television , the internet) the advertising has become so easy and so effective that it is delivered to each and every person and anyone who encounters that advertisement tends to buy that product. They are so impressive. Even if we go to a gas station there is a discount, for clothes, for medicines ,,,,, for every thing there is some bonus (so called) to the customers, which is just ,in my opinion, another start to improve their business and get profits. The other day i was walking in a street and i saw that on the other side of a road there was this man beginning with a note in his hand "need food" and when i looked at him and tried to walk away he had taken out another note with" Need booze" and asked me to give him some money for what ever note i liked.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I am happy. I am young, and I am happy. I have never been old in my life so I can not know if I agree or disagree with the statement, basing myself on my own life experience. But I can answer based on what I have lived through this time and on what I have seen around me during this time. And I will say that I agree. There are a lot of advantages to getting older. Older people have more freedom (they can do whatever they want to and do not have to ask anyone), they earn their living on their own so they are able to plan better than young people because they do not have to rely on their parents. But I am still thinking that young people enjoy life more than older people do. There are just many more things to do, things to enjoy, for young people. They do not have as many responsibilities as older people, so they do not have as many things to worry about. For example, I said that older people have more freedom, earning their own living. It is true. But what I did not say then, is that there is more fun, to me, in enjoying life basically, without any trouble in mind, or much less important ones. Furthermore, young people often have many more possibilities to meet new people and make new friends than older ones. Older people have to have a job to earn their living.

But I can answer based on what I have lived through this time and on what I have seen around me during this time. And I will say that I agree. There are a lot of advantages to getting older. Older people have more freedom (they can do whatever they want to and do not have to ask anyone), they earn their living on their own so they are able to plan better than young people because they do not have to rely on their parents. But I am still thinking that young people enjoy life more than older people do. There are just many more things to do, things to enjoy, for young people. title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: It's very difficult to know how many cars there will be in twenty years, because there are some reasons that tell us that there will be more cars, but there are also reasons in the opposite way. I think it is more common and easier to expect more cars in the future, because if you look at the number of cars twenty years ago you will be able to see that there were fewer cars than today, If this trend continues, there will be a lot of cars on our streets. The problem is that they cannot continue forever because we don't have enough resorts to create and keep them alive. And also we have no space for those cars. For example, I have a car but I'm thinking of selling it because it's impossible for me to find a place where I can put it. Another reason to expect an increase in the number of cars in the next twenty years, is the decrease in the price of a car. Nowadays everybody or almost everybody is able to buy a car. But this is not completely true because this part of the world is richer each day but the other part of the world is very poor and they don't buy and produce any car. Another reason is the tendency of this world. I think that communication is now the more important thing.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: There are people who support the idea that most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are, and others do not support this idea. I would say that I agree with this idea that most advertisers make products seem much better. In the following discussion, I would like to explain the reason with some examples. Firstly, in Japan, I have heard news that some people have died because of using to reduce weight pills. Recently, over weight problems have got bigger in Japan too. Many people want to reduce their weight in an easy way. This company imported this pill from another country and advertised it all over the country. It says that some people could lose 5 kg in two weeks or less than a week. Many people bought it and some of them had really terrible results. I am not sure that pill was the main cause of their death, but I had heard that it works to blood pressure. So some of them affected badly. Secondly, I like to go to restaurants or bars.

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Nowadays a lot has been said about the role of the advertisement in contemporary society. Some marketing practitioners have defended the idea that marketing and, in particular, advertising keep playing a neutral role in modern society by only promoting the features of a product. On the contrary, among academics and most of the public opinion, this claim has completely been rejected. In my opinion this second position best highlights what the actual situation really is: Products are overpushed through the advertising channels by mistelling what they really value for the final customer. Ever more commercials promise customers greater benefits from their products misleading the real wants and needs of them. Modern advertising is able to manipulate the customer's will and often convince him/her to buy products not really wanted. It may also happen that the features illustrated by the commercial are really disappointing to the customer when this experience the product. Furthermore, by lying to the customer through advertising, the firm can really harm the final consumer. This is the case with those kinds of products that cause accidents for the user.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree with the statement. I believe young people enjoy life more than older people do. Young people have got a stronger physical structure and mental capacity than older people do. Feeling young itself brings in a lot of self confidence to face any problems and perform many situations in life which most old people lack. Visiting beautiful places all over the world can really rejoice human beings which is easier for young people than older ones as age is a great barrier to making a world trip. Playing sports is good for your health and it is also a big recreation that relieves us from many worldly issues ,which young people can do with ease than the older ones. Sex is one of the important parts of life.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Young people are more likely to enjoy life than older people. Age factor is one of the main reasons that put life of older people within limits. First of all, most sports require an age limit, such as Tennis and Football. As an example, my father loves Football but he can no longer play it, because he cannot run as fast as he used to. Another example is Mountain Climbing. Most mountain climbers are young because this kind of activity requires good heart rates and endurance, and as we all know, the older a person gets, the less his heart operates due to age factor. Second, older people have less sex drive than they had before.

title: It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject.
text: Towards the statement that "It is better to have broad knowledge of many academic subjects than to specialize in one specific subject", I would say that I agree with this statement. There are several reasons to support my belief. Firstly, specializing in only one specific subject would make a person become abstract. Concentrating on training students in one specific subject may have a harmful effect on children's development. If children receive specialized training in their studies, it may be too early for them to decide what to learn for their future. A student may choose to study biology in Grade 7, for example, because he likes animals. When he grows up, he may find that the subject is completely different from what he expects and it will be too late for him to switch to another subject. Career prospects are the second issue that I consider. Though having deep knowledge in one specific subject would let people become experts, society only requires a small portion of such kinds of experts, where college professors are the examples. Instead, having a variety of academic knowledge provides people with diverse potential job positions to select from. For example, a person who studies history may only be able to work in a museum.

Concentrating on training students in one specific subject may have a harmful effect on children\'s development. If children receive specialized training in their studies, it may be too early for them to decide what to learn for their future. Instead, having a variety of academic knowledge provides people with diverse potential job positions to select from.', 'For example, a person who studies history may only be able to work in a museum.']

title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: Nowadays, many people can see lots of advertisements. that is very effective for people. so, making an advertisement is very important for the company. I think most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are. First, the purpose of advertising a product is to sell more. so, they can add some lies in order to sell more. For example, I remembered that one company makes an advertisement for a hair shampoo. In the TV, the advertisement introduced that when I use the shampoo, my hair changes to silk. that's a lie and exaggeration. but the company sold lots of them. Second, if they tell only facts about a product in advertisements, no one will buy the product. If I were an advertisement maker, I would not tell only facts. In fact, many companies try to show more better than to show more factually. It's of course  true. Third, no one intervenes in their advertisement idea hardly. many advertisements make products much better. But If one company only expresses their product they really are, the company willn't succeed. they have to sell their product. Therefore, the purpose of advertising a product is to sell more. and many companies try to show more better than to show more factually. and no one intervenes in their advertisement. It's free.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: The reason that the younger generation seem to enjoy life more than the older generation is that they seem to have a greater ability to make what they desire come true. this could be because of the greater energy levels that the younger generation has when compared to the Old. The second reason is the flexible attitude that the young can take. they are easily adaptable to the situation and change accordingly and make the most of things, but on the contrary the old are not that flexible. they do not want to change from the normal routine work that they try to. they are very much used to the old work that they always do and thus they miss enjoying other works which they can. For example a group of young people when they are out would always like to try out new things which they have never before done but old people always end up doing things that they have always been doing. but on the contrary enjoyment would mean differently to different people. The old grandpa of two children would find great pleasure in telling a story to his little grandchildren.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: The statement " Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well. "has several examples in scientific history that show that it is true. One of them is Albert Einstein, who at the beginning of his professional life had strong difficulties finding a suitable job. He ignored his friends who were arguing about not changing his job and went to a university in Berlin where he developed the theory of relative time. Another example (where the meaning of success is different) is the attempts to kill Hitler during the second world war.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree with the statement that successful people take risks rather than doing only what they know. Successful people do take risks as they want to escape from the ordinary life. I do not call myself a very successful person, but I once took a risk and my life has been better. First, some millionaire famous in one area, once was an expert in other things, and I think that happens because those people know how to master one kind of subject. Henry Ford, the father of the car, once was an expert on watch repair. He worked as one to earn his room rent and to study mechanics. Then he thought about transportation and invented cars. Next, the success is equal to the riskyness. Which means that when you have a high probability of failure, then you have a high reward when you succeed. I am in middle school grade three, since grade two, I have liked a girl.

I do not call myself a very successful person, but I once took a risk and my life has been better. First, some millionaire famous in one area, once was an expert in other things, and I think that happens because those people know how to master one kind of subject. Henry Ford, the father of the car, once was an expert on watch repair. He worked as one to earn his room rent and to study mechanics. Then he thought about transportation and invented cars. Next, the success is equal to the riskyness. Which means that when you have a high probability of failure, then you have a high reward when you succeed. I am in middle school grade three, since grade two, I have liked a girl. She is in the same school and I still like her. I wanted to say that I like her, but I got too shy when I stood in front of her.

I do not call myself a very successful person, but I once took a risk and my life has been better. First, some millionaire famous in one area, once was an expert in other things, and I think that happens because those people know how to master one kind of subject. title: Most advertisements make products seem much better than they really are.
text: It's a common secret that nowadays we are working so hard and thus making us not have so much time to do anything. title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: I agree it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. Understanding ideas was an important skill we should learn about. When we are studied in high school, the teacher always helps us to understand what they just said. that was why we have to learn how to understand ideas and concepts. When i was still a child my parents told me a lot of stuff, but i even asked about why, because i never thought about things, after i grew up to teenager, i started to ask why, because i am starting to ask things in my hand. I am starting to understand ideas and concepts. In my opinion, i remember the exam always trying to text the students who can or can not understand ideas, and putting them into different levels. title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: The "understand" function is an asset when it comes to learning something. Learning without understanding can bring people to a simple repetition or reproduction of what they have learnt. Robots, and apes used during experiments learn this way. The Pavlov experiment when a dog learns to be prepared for food-time instinctively is a great example to show that learning does not require much effort. Human beings have more faculty to develop by understanding, though they still have to learn. Understanding a concept developed in class helps the student to relate this concept to similar situations where the concept was applied. The student, in this case, is able to review the concept in any kind of situation and is free from his books theory for this part of the subject. For example if someone does not understand the concept of what is the natural purpose of having sex, this person might be interested in the fact that having sex just provides him with personal satisfaction.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: The "understand" function is an asset when it comes to learning something. Learning without understanding can bring people to a simple repetition or reproduction of what they have learnt. Robots, and apes used during experiments learn this way. The Pavlov experiment when a dog learns to be prepared for food-time instinctively is a great example to show that learning does not require much effort. Human beings have more faculty to develop by understanding, though they still have to learn. Understanding a concept developed in class helps the student to relate this concept to similar situations where the concept was applied. The student, in this case, is able to review the concept in any kind of situation and is free from his books theory for this part of the subject. For example if someone does not understand the concept of what is the natural purpose of having sex, this person might be interested in the fact that having sex just provides him with personal satisfaction. On the other hand, by understanding the concept, he would know that he is not the only one being pleased, that sex can bring a child, and we can go further if we consider the psychological, and physical dimensions of a human being. As for the example, the student might understand the concept, learn better the subject, be able to transmit the idea to others, and find more examples for explanation of what he has learnt. In addition without frequent repetition the student will be able to recall the concept and then the facts more faster than a simple fact learning (view as a repetitive exercise). It is difficult to visualize a fact that you have never learned, or experienced from a book. Because more academic books present the concept first, then examples; It would be easier for a student who understands the concept to create an example of his own and go further in the lesson than if one only learned the examples. At the test the person who learns is more likely to answer wrong a lot of questions related to the concept he never understood. History has shown that research has been developed by people who understood the concepts left by others. They develop the concepts, and then use experiments and examples to support and verify their view. As students are supposed to study the matters they are faced with, it is more important for them to "understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts. ".

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: Cars are the major means of transportation in modern society. In my opinion, there won't be fewer cars than there are today. People are getting more and more today so that they need more cars. Also, people's lives are getting better. Many families need more than one car. Technology is developing, people discover many types of energy sources for cars. Many kinds of energy are cleaner than regular gas. The cars' number is growing with the population. People are the heart of society.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Everyone has different opinions on whether traveling in a group that is led by a tour guide or by yourself. It depends on individual people's various points of view. However in my opinion , traveling in a group gives more advantages to me. Because, it is convenient and easy to understand the country. First of all, people can visit all the places with out any difficulties. Of course it would be more interesting and advantageous to travel by yourself , but traveling in a group gives more profit to people. In my personal experience, when I travelled alone to Australia, I had trouble with the visiting tourist place, Because I lost my self in the middle of the town, so I faced difficulties looking for the place. Moreover, I spent about two hours looking for an information center. If I had a tour guide, I would have a wonderful vacation in Australia visiting many fun places , instead of wasting time on the road. Secondly, people can understand and the country easily. Although, people traveling without a tour guide can also understand the culture and country, however, I believe it is more beneficial to have a tour guide. When my mother and father traveled to New Zealand, they found so many interesting things there, because the guide translated all the information that they visited and also, telling a story that is relevant to the event or history. Therefore my parents could understand the culture and also some traditional stories with out difficulties. Thus, people, like my parents who can not speak the language that they are visiting, can also learn about the country with out any trouble. In conclusion, for these reasons that I have mentioned above, even though, traveling around the country with a tour guide might be more memorable and more fun, I think however leading a guide more advantageous to me. No one can deny the importance of these assets.

title: Successful people try new things and take risks rather than only doing what they already know how to do well.
text: I agree with the statement. Being successful has various meanings, for example economically, socially, and so on? If I am definitely successful at achieving something that others want but don't have or cannot obtain easily, those people who are successful seem to tend to try new things and take risks. Firstly, if they want to continue to be successful, they have to try new things and take risks. In the business scene, successful investors try to look for something new. They always try to do something different from normal. Because only doing something normal cannot lead to making money. By searching for different ways, they can have more possibilities to encounter better ways and unique ideas. By doing the same things as others, normally it doesn't make profits. Second, they are tired of only doing what they already know how to do well. They always like to challenge new things and don't stick to the things they know. They are looking for something that makes them excited. For example, rich people are tired of saving money.

title: The best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide.
text: Some people say that the best way to travel is in a group led by a tour guide because of convenience and obtaining information by tour guide. Both ways of this argument have advantages. However I would side with that the best way to travel is alone without a tour guide because of the free and beneficial experience. Now then I will present this opinion by considering these two advantages. On the one hand, traveling with a group led by a tour guide might be said to bring advantages. On top of that if people travel with their guide they enjoy their tour conveniently. In other words the schedule is already set so people just travel without thinking such as where I am and then and so on. In addition the tour guide gives the tour information whenever people travel there. when I was in high school I travelled in America led by a tour guide the tour guide makes my family feel convenient. On the other hand,. Travelling alone without a tour guide would give many advantages. Firstly, if people travel alone they enjoy freedom and without inference and they can wander anywhere that they want. If the opportunity to travel is given to me I want to travel to the swiss that I want to go to. Secondly, travelling alone is a good choice by experience directly. In other words this is useful for social relationships and social experience. So traveling is very good.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: I agree that young people enjoy life more than older people do. Young people. Generally, people say that the young have vivid eyes and the old have tired eyes. The young have many dreams and a lot of time. In contrast, though the old have big money, they do not have much time remaining in their lives. Obviously, young people can do anything in their lives and the old can have limited lives. Young people have strong dreams. Though young people have very long lives remaining, the older have short lives. So, The older may mind how to live healthily, on contrast, the young mostly do not mind their health. So, the young may not take easy performances. The young acquire little experience in their lives. So, they do not think about the fear of the failure of their dreams completely when they carry out their dreams. In contrast, the old deeply consider the actions of their dreams about whether they will be injured or not in their safe future. Indeed, the old often have far more money than the young do. But, young people can work very hard and they can have a little money. The little money is enough for the young because the young seriously think that the dream and time are more valuable than big money. So, young people enjoy their life more than the old do. Though the young must keep this good economy in the world, the young must protect the old, and the young must keep the peace in the world, the young have vivid eyes to their futures. I insist that the time which the young have is a very important thing for all people. Everyone likes a very good comfortable life. Some people like un.

title: Young people enjoy life more than older people do.
text: Young people enjoy life more than older people. There are two reasons for my choice. Firstly, young people are more healthy than older people. Secondly, young people want to learn many different things especially enjoyable things. Young people are more healthy than older people. Health is important for doing enjoyable things. If you are not healthy you can not work, go to school, watch TV. Shortly you can do nothing that you have to and of course you can not enjoy yourself. When you go to a pub, you dance and sometimes you drink. When you dance you really get tired. Dance needs energy and energy is in the youth. Also most old people have to use drugs and that' s why they can not drink alcohol. Another reason is that old people have to sleep long hours to feel well but young people do not. Young people want to have experiments about everything enjoyable. Old people lived many things and they did not want to learn something new. They do just that they have to such as sleeping, working, eating. The old people want to relax.

title: It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts.
text: In this world, every one needs higher education to make the dream come true. It is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts than it is for them to learn facts because it is good for them, their education, and their dreams. First of all,it is more important for students to understand ideas and concepts when they are young because after they grow up, it is hard to learn new things. If he or she understands ideas and concepts, it will help them a lot and they will be proud of themselves and they will have fun studying because they can answer the questions. Not only is it good for him or her, but it is good for their education also. After they think it is fun to study when they are young, they will love the school because they want to know new things and they want to be able to answer the questions. If they love going to school, they get high education. Not only are they proud of them selves, but everyone is proud of them if they go to go to high education college. If they went to a good college it would help their life alot and it would change the world. Finally, if they have high education, they can probably get the job they are dreaming of. They can make their dream come true and also, they can get high payments. Everyone needs money and it is better to have it than not to have it.

title: In twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
text: I completely disagree with the statement that there will be fewer cars in use than there are today in twenty years. I have three strong reasons to support my opinion. The demand for cars is huge. It is spread worldwide and no one can now believe life exists without cars. In America, I experienced we definitely need cars to live especially in rural areas. To go to the supermarket, to meet my friends, to go to school even, we need cars to bring us. It is impossible to walk to the station, if it is located far from one's house. I do not think that this situation and demand will change in twenty years, which is too early. In my country, Japan, the car industry is really huge to support our economy. Japanese people are commonly said to be good at making electrical products including cars. Japanese companies extend not only inside of Japan, but also worldwide. Toyota, Matsuda and Mitsubishi are companies producing a great number of cars all over the world. If there is no need to produce present numbers of cars, these companies will be in serious trouble with the business function of my country. As a way to maintain the present economy, the Japanese government will cooperate with companies. So people continue to buy cars for a long while. Nowadays, I saw great news on the television screen. It is said that some Americans invented a new electric car, which runs faster than the Jaguar and produces no gas at all.
